bibl.title: Timocrates
bibl.#text:
Ulpian
                        on the  of Demosthenes, 9, p. 805.

l: o(\s sofi/a| prw=tos pa/ntwn, tou/tou tri/pod' au)dw=.
pri\n tri/poda xru/seion, o(\n *(/hfaistos ka/me teu/xwn,
e)k me/ssou pe/myhte, kai\ e)s do/mon a)ndro\s i(/khtai
o(\s sofi/a| ta/ t' e)o/nta ta/ t' e)sso/mena prode/dorken.
sou= ma=llon prapi/dessin a)rhro/ta peukali/mh|sin,
skopw=n: ta\ *puqoi= d' ou)k e)a=| me gra/mmata.
gumnai=s xersi\ me\n le/ontas w(s a)/rnas diafqei/rwn,
pteroi=s posi\ d' u(pernikw=n a(/rmata taxudro/ma,
th=| de\ xeiri/ ti sph/laion a)nth/reise sumpi=pton.
o( *sikelo\s *dio/dwros gra/fei th\n i(stori/an.

l.#text: ou) pri\n th=sde po/lhos e)rei/yete pu/rgon e(lo/ntes,

l: pri/n ken e)mw=| teme/nei kuanw/pidos *)amfitri/ths
ku=ma potiklu/zh| keladou=n i(erh=|sin e)p' a)ktai=s.
to\n *)attiko\n kate/kausen e)n tau/rw| tw=| xalke/w|.
ou(=tos ga\r to\ mhxa/nhma tou= tau/rou xalkourgh/sas
toi=s mucwth=rsi tou= boo\s e)te/kthnen au)li/skous,
a)ne/ptuce kai\ qu/ran de\ pro\s tw=| pleurw=| tou= tau/rou:
kai\ dw=ron tw=| *fala/ridi tou=ton to\n tau=ron a)/gei.
*fa/laris de\ to\n a)/nqrwpon e)n dw/rois deciou=tai,
to\ de\ mhxa/nhma qeoi=s kaqierou=n keleu/ei.
w(s d' a)naptu/cas to\ pleuro\n o( xalkourgo\s e)kei=nos
do/lon to\n kakomh/xanon e)cei=pen a)panqrw/pws,
ei)/ tina bou/lei, *fa/lari, kola/zein tw=n a)nqrw/pwn,
e)/ndon tou= tau/rou kateirgnu\s pu=r u(postrw/nnu ka/tw:
do/cei d' o( tau=ros stenagmoi=s muka=sqai toi=s e)kei/nou,
su\ d' h(donh\n toi=s stenagmoi=s e(/ceis au)loi=s mukth/rwn.
tou=to maqw\n o( *fa/laris kai\ musaxqei\s e)kei=non,
a)/ge, fhsi/, *peri/lae, su\ prw=tos dei=con tou=to,
kai\ tou\s au)lou=ntas mi/mhsai, tra/nwso/n sou th\n te/xnhn.
w(s de\ pare/du mimhth\s dh=qen tw=n au)lhma/twn,
klei/ei to\n tau=ron *fa/laris kai\ pu=r u(poswreu/ei.
o(/pws de\ to\ xalkou/rghma qanw\n mh\ e)mmia/nh|,
kata\ petrw=n e)krh/mnisen e)ca/cas h(miqnh=ta.
gra/fei peri\ tou= tau/rou de\ *loukiano\s o( *su/ros,
*dio/dwros kai\ *pi/ndaros, su\n tou/tois te muri/oi.

l.#text: e)k nefe/lhs pe/letai xio/nos me/nos h)de\ xala/zhs,

l: bronth\ d' e)k lampra=s gi/netai a)steroph=s.
a)ndrw=n d' e)k mega/lwn po/lis o)/llutai, ei)s de\ mona/rxou
dh=mos a)idrei/h| doulosu/nhn e)/pesen.
li/hn d' e)ca/rant' ou) r(a/|dio/n e)sti katasxei=n
u(/steron, a)ll' h)/dh xrh\ peri\ pa/nta noei=n.

l.#text: ei) de\ pepo/nqate lugra\ di' u(mete/ran kako/thta,

l: mh\ qeoi=sin tau/thn moi=ran e)pamfe/rete:
au)toi\ ga\r tou/tous hu)ch/sate r(u/mata do/ntes,
kai\ dia\ tou=to kakh\n e)/sxete doulosu/nhn.
u(mw=n d' ei(=s me\n e(/kastos a)lw/pekos i)/xnesi bai/nei,
su/mpasin d' u(mi=n kou=fos e)/nesti no/os.
ei)s ga\r glw=ssan o(ra=te kai\ ei)s e)/pos ai)o/lon a)ndro/s,
ei)s e)/rgon d' ou)de\n gino/menon ble/pete.
kai\ to/te, *lude\ podabre/, poluyh/fida par' *(/ermon
feu/gein mhde\ me/nein mhd' ai)dei=sqai kako\s ei)=nai.
mh\ bou/lou polu/eukton i)a\n kata\ dw/mat' a)kou/ein
paido\s fqeggome/nou: to\ de/ soi polu\ lw/ion a)mfi\s
e)/mmenai: au)dh/sei ga\r e)n h)/mati prw=ton a)no/lbw|.

l.#text:
*)arkadi/an m' ai)tei=s; me/ga m' ai)tei=s: ou)/ toi
                            dw/sw.

l: polloi\ e)n *)arkadi/a| balanhfa/goi a)/ndres e)/asin,
oi(/ s' a)pokwlu/sousin: e)gw\ de/ toi ou)/ti megai/rw.
dw/sw soi *tege/an possi/kroton o)rxh/sasqai
kai\ kalo\n pedi/on sxoi/nw| diametrh/sasqai.
e)/nq' a)/nemoi pnei/ousi du/w kraterh=s u(p' a)na/gkhs
kai\ tu/pos a)nti/tupos kai\ ph=m' e)pi\ ph/mati kei=tai.
e)/nq' *)agamemnoni/dhn kate/xei fusi/zoos ai)=a:
to\n su\ komissa/menos *tege/hs e)pita/rroqos e)/ssh|.

q:
ei)/qe ga/r tis pei/seie nhsiw/tas
                    su\n i(/ppois parata/casqai *ludoi=s.

o(ra=te, w)= a)/ndres, tosou=to plh=qos u(f' e(no\s diwko/menon dia\
                    deili/an; e)pei/ toi ge ei) tolmh/seian e)pistre/yai, r(a|di/ws tou= diw/kontos
                    a)\n perige/nointo.

cit.quote:
*(hro/dotos kata\ *ce/rchn gegonw\s toi=s xro/nois fhsi\n
                    *)assuri/ous e)/th pentako/sia pro/teron th=s *)asi/as a)/rcantas u(po\ *mh/dwn
                    kataluqh=nai. e)/peita basile/a me\n mhde/na gene/sqai to\n a)mfisbhth/sonta
                    tw=n o(/lwn e)pi\ polla\s genea/s, ta\s de\ po/leis kaq' e(auta\s tattome/nas
                    dioikei=sqai dhmokratikw=s: to\ de\ teleutai=on pollw=n e)tw=n dielqo/ntwn
                    ai(reqh=nai basile/a para\ toi=s *mh/dois a)/ndra dikaiosu/nh| dia/foron,
                    o)/noma *kuaca/rhn. tou=ton de\ prw=ton e)pixeirh=sai prosa/gesqai tou\s
                    plhsioxw/rous, kai\ toi=s *mh/dois a)rxhgo\n gene/sqai th=s tw=n o(/lwn
                    h(gemoni/as: e)/peita tou\s e)kgo/nous a)ei\ proskataktwme/nous pollh\n th=s
                    o(mo/rou xw/ras au)ch=sai th\n basilei/an me/xri *)astua/gous tou=
                    katapolemhqe/ntos u(po\ *ku/rou kai\ *persw=n: peri\ w(=n nu=n h(mei=s ta\
                    kefa/laia proeirhko/tes ta\ kata\ me/ros u(/steron a)kribw=s a)nagra/yomen,
                    e)peida\n e)pi\ tou\s oi)kei/ous xro/nous e)piba/lwmen. kata\ ga\r to\ deu/teron
                    e)/tos th=s e(ptakaideka/ths *)olumpia/dos h(|re/qh basileu\s u(po\ *mh/dwn
                    *kuaca/rhs kaq' *(hro/doton.

*)astiba/ra tou= basile/ws tw=n *mh/dwn e)n
                    *)ekbata/nois gh/ra| teleuth/santos th
 a)rxh
 *)aspa/ndan to
 ui(o

                    diade/casqai, to
 u(po\ tw=n *(ellh/nwn *)astua/ghn kalou/menon: tou/tou d'
                    u(po\ *ku/rou tou= *pe/rsou katapolemhqe/ntos metapesei=n th
 basilei/an ei)s
                    *pe/rsas, peri\ w(=n h(mei=s ta\ kata\ me/ros e)n toi=s i)di/ois xro/nois
                    a)kribw=s a)nagra/yomen.

p.#text:
h)=n de\
                    kai\ *so/lwn patro\s me\n *)echkesti/dou, to\ ge/nos e)k *salami=nos th=s
                    *)attikh=s, sofi/a| de\ kai\ paidei/a| pa/ntas tou\s kaq' e(auto\n
                    u(perbeblhkw/s. fu/sei de\ pro\s a)reth\n tw=n a)/llwn polu\ diafe/rwn
                    e)zh/lwsen a)reth\n e)painoume/nhn: pa=si ga\r toi=s maqh/masi polu\n xro/non
                    e)ndiatri/yas a)qlhth\s e)ge/neto pa/shs a)reth=s. kata\ me\n ga\r th\n tou= paido\s h(liki/an paideutai=s
                    e)xrh/sato toi=s a)ri/stois, a)ndrwqei\s de\ sundie/triye toi=s megi/sthn
                    e)/xousi du/namin e)pi\ filosofi/a|. dio\ kai\ tou/tois o(milw=n kai\
                    sundiatri/bwn w)noma/sqh me\n ei(=s tw=n e(pta\ sofw=n kai\ to\ prwtei=on th=s
                    sune/sews ou) mo/non para\ tou/tois toi=s a)ndra/sin, a)lla\ kai\ para\ pa=si
                    toi=s qaumazome/nois a)phne/gkato. o(/ti o( au)to\s *so/lwn, e)n th=| nomoqesi/a| mega/lhn
                    do/can peripoihsa/menos, e)n tai=s i)diwtikai=s o(mili/ais kai\ a)pokri/sesin,
                    e)/ti de\ sumbouli/ais, qaumasto\s e)tu/gxane dia\ th\n e)n paidei/a| prokoph/n.
                        o(/ti o(
                    au)to\s *so/lwn, th\n o(/lhn a)gwgh\n th=s po/lews e)xou/shs *)iwnikh/n, kai\
                    dia\ th\n trufh\n kai\ th\n r(a|stw/nhn e)kteqhlumme/nwn tw=n a)nqrw/pwn,
                    mete/qhke th=| sunhqei/a| pro\s a)reth\n kai\ zh=lon tw=n a)ndrei/wn pra/cewn.
                    dio\ th=| tou/tou nomoqesi/a| kaqoplisqe/ntes ta\s yuxa\s *(armo/dios kai\
                    *)aristogei/twn katalu/ein e)pexei/rhsan th\n tw=n *peisistratidw=n
                        a)rxh/n.
                    o(/ti
                    *kroi=sos o( *ludw=n basileu\s mega/las kekthme/nos duna/meis kai\ polu\n e)k
                    paraskeuh=s seswreukw\s a)/rguro/n te kai\ xruso/n, metepe/mpeto tw=n *(ellh/nwn
                    tou\s sofwta/tous, kai\ sundiatri/bwn au)toi=s meta\ pollw=n dw/rwn e)ce/pemye
                    kai\ au)to\s pro\s a)reth\n w)felei=to polla/. pote\ de\ tou=ton metapemya/menos
                    kai\ ta\s duna/meis kai\ to\n plou=ton e)pideica/menos, h)rw/thsen ei)/ tis
                    e(/teros au)tw=| dokei= makariw/teros ei)=nai. o( de\ *so/lwn th=| sunh/qei toi=s filoso/fois xrhsa/menos parrhsi/a| e)/fh
                    mhde/na tw=n zw/ntwn ei)=nai maka/rion: to\n ga\r e)p' eu)daimoni/a|
                    pefronhmatisme/non kai\ dokou=nta th\n tu/xhn e)/xein sunergo\n mh\ ginw/skein
                    ei) diamenei= met' au)tou= me/xri th=s e)sxa/ths. skopei=n ou)=n e)/fhse dei=n
                    th\n tou= bi/ou teleuth\n kai\ to\n dieutuxh/santa to/te proshko/ntws le/gein
                    maka/rion. o( de\ *kroi=sos u(/steron
                    geno/menos ai)xma/lwtos u(po\ *ku/rou kai\ me/llwn e)pi\ mega/lh| pura=|
                    katakai/esqai, th=s *so/lwnos a)pofa/sews e)mnhmo/neusen. dio\ kai\ tou= puro\s
                    h)/dh perifle/gontos a)nebo/a sunexw=s to\ tou= *so/lwnos o)/noma. o( de\ *ku=ros prospe/myas tou\s peusome/nous, ti/s h(
                    sunexh/s e)sti tou= *so/lwnos o)nomasi/a, maqw\n ta)lhqe\s mete/pese toi=s
                    logismoi=s kai\ nomi/sas th\n a)po/krisin tou= *so/lwnos a)lhqinh\n ei)=nai th=s
                    me\n u(perhfanei/as a)pani/stato, th\n de\ pura\n katasbe/sas e)/swse to\n
                    *kroi=son kai\ to\ loipo\n e(/na tw=n fi/lwn kathri/qmhsen.
                    o(/ti o( *so/lwn
                    h(gei=to tou\s me\n pu/ktas kai\ stadiei=s kai\ tou\s a)/llous a)qlhta\s mhde\n
                    a)cio/logon sumba/llesqai tai=s po/lesi pro\s swthri/an, tou\s de\ fronh/sei
                    kai\ a)reth=| diafe/rontas mo/nous du/nasqai ta\s patri/das e)n toi=s kindu/nois
                    diafula/ttein. o(/ti peri\ tou= xrusou= tri/podos
                    a)mfisbhth/sews ou)/shs h( *puqi/a e)/xrhsen ou(/tws: oi( de/ fasin a)/llws o(/ti pole/mou genome/nou toi=s *)/iwsi pro\s
                    a)llh/lous, kai\ tou= tri/podos para\ saghne/wn a)nenexqe/ntos, e)perwth=sai
                    to\n qeo\n peri\ th=s katalu/sews tou= pole/mou. h( de\ e)/fh,
                    o(/ti oi(
                    *milh/sioi a)kolouqh=sai boulo/menoi tw=| xrhsmw=| *qa/lhti tw=| *milhsi/w| to\
                    a)ristei=on e)bou/lonto dou=nai: to\n d' ei)pei=n w(s ou)k e)/sti pa/ntwn
                    sofw/tatos, sumbouleu/ein de\ pro\s e(/teron pe/mpein sofw/teron. tou/tw| de\
                    tw=| tro/pw| kai\ tw=n a)/llwn tw=n e(pta\ sofw=n a)popoihsame/nwn to\n tri/poda
                    *so/lwni di/dosqai dokou=nti pa/ntas a)nqrw/pous u(perbeblh=sqai sofi/a| te kai\
                    sune/sei. to\n de\ sumbouleu=sai tou=ton a)naqei=nai *)apo/llwni: tou=ton ga\r
                    ei)=nai sofw/teron pa/ntwn.1 o(/ti o( au)to\s pro\s th=| tou= bi/ou
                    katastrofh=| o(rw=n *peisi/straton pro\s xa/rin ta\ plh/qh dhmagwgou=nta kai\
                    pro\s turanni/da parormw=nta, to\ me\n prw=ton lo/gois e)pexei/rhsen
                    a)potre/pein tau/ths th=s e)pibolh=s: ou) prose/xontos de\ au)tou= proh=lqen
                    ei)s th\n a)gora\n meta\ th=s panopli/as pantelw=s h)/dh geghrakw/s. sundramo/ntos de\ tou= plh/qous pro\s au)to\n dia\ to\
                    para/docon, pareka/lei tou\s poli/tas a)nalabei=n ta\ o(/pla kai\ paraxrh=ma
                    katalu/ein to\n tu/rannon: ou)deno\s de\ au)tw=| prose/xontos, kai\ pa/ntwn
                    au)tou= mani/an kataginwsko/ntwn, tinw=n de\ paraghra=n au)to\n a)pofainome/nwn,
                    o( me\n *peisi/stratos h)/dh tina\s dorufo/rous periago/menos prosh=lqe tw=|
                    *so/lwni kai\ e)pu/qeto ti/ni qarrw=n th\n turanni/da katalu/ein au)tou=
                    bou/letai, tou= de\ ei)po/ntos o(/ti tw=| gh/ra|, qauma/sas th\n fro/nhsin
                    au)tou= ou)de\n au)to\n h)di/khsen.
                    o(/ti to\n parano/mois kai\ a)di/kois pra/cesin
                    e)pibalo/menon ou)k a)\n proshko/ntws sofo\n nomi/zesqai. o(/ti fasi\n *)ana/xarsin to\n *sku/qhn fronou=nta e)pi\
                    sofi/a| me/ga paragene/sqai *puqw/de kai\ e)perwth=sai ti/s e)stin au)tou= tw=n
                    *(ellh/nwn sofw/teros. kai\ ei)pei=n,o(/stis h)=n *malieu\s kai\ w)/|kei th\n *oi)/thn ei)s kw/mhn *xhna\s
                        kaloume/nhn.
                    o(/ti
                    *mu/swn tis h)=n *malieu/s, o(\s w)/|kei e)n kw/mh| *xhna\s kaloume/nh|, to\n
                    a(/panta xro/non e)n a)grw=| diatri/bwn kai\ u(po\ tw=n pollw=n a)gnoou/menos:
                    o(\n a)nteish=can ei)s tou\s e(pta\ sofou/s, e)kkri/nantes to\n *peri/andron
                    to\n *kori/nqion dia\ to\ tu/rannon gegone/nai pikro/n.
                    o(/ti o(
                    *so/lwn polupragmonh/sas to\n to/pon e)n w(=| die/tribe *mu/swn, kate/laben
                    au)to\n e)pi\ th=s a(/lw pro\s a)/rotron prosbalo/nta e)xe/tlhn, kai\ peiraqei\s
                    tou= a)ndro\s e)/fh, ou)x w(/ra nu=n a)ro/trou, w)= *mu/swn, kai\ ou(=tos, ou)
                    xrh=sqai, ei)=pen, a)ll' e)piskeua/zein.
                    o(/ti
                    *xi/lwn tw=| lo/gw| su/mfwnon e)/sxe to\n bi/on, o(/per spani/ws eu(/roi tis
                    a)\n gino/menon. tw=n ga\r kaq' h(ma=s filoso/fwn tou\s plei/stous i)dei=n
                    e)/sti le/gontas me\n ta\ ka/llista, pra/ttontas de\ ta\ xei/rista, kai\ th\n
                    e)n tai=s a)paggeli/ais au)tw=n semno/thta kai\ su/nesin dia\ th=s pei/ras
                    e)legxome/nhn. o( de\ *xi/lwn xwri\s th=s kata\ to\n bi/on e)n a(/pasi toi=s
                    prattome/nois a)reth=s polla\ dienoh/qh kai\ a)pefqe/gcato mnh/mhs a)/cia.
                    o(/ti
                    *xi/lwn a)fiko/menos ei)s *delfou\s kai\ kaqa/per a)parxa\s poiou/menos tw=|
                    qew=| th=s i)di/as sune/sews e)pe/grayen e)pi/ tina ki/ona tri/a tau=ta,
                    , kai\ ,
                    kai\ tri/ton . tou/twn e(/kaston
                    u(pa/rxon braxu\ kai\ *lakwniko\n mega/lhn e)/xei th\n a)naqew/rhsin. to\ ga\r gnw=qi sauto\n paragge/llei paideuqh=nai kai\
                    fro/nimon gene/sqai: ou(/tw ga\r a)/n tis e(auto\n gnoi/h: h)\ o(/ti oi(
                    a)/moiroi paidei/as kai\ a)lo/gistoi kata\ to\ plei=ston e(autou\s sunetwta/tous
                    u(peilh/fasin, h(/per e)sti\ tw=n a)maqiw=n a)maqesta/th kata\ to\n *pla/twna,
                    h)\ o(/ti tou\s ponhrou\s e)pieikei=s h(gou=ntai, tou\s de\ xrhstou\s a)na/palin
                    fau/lous: mo/nws ga\r a)/n tis ou(/tws e(auto\n gnoi/h kai\ e(/teron, tuxw\n
                    paidei/as kai\ sune/sews perittote/ras. to\ de\
                    mhde\n a)/gan metria/zein e)n pa=si kai\ mhde\ peri\ e(no\s tw=n a)nqrwpi/nwn
                    telei/ws diori/zesqai, w(s *)epida/mnioi. ou(=toi ga\r para\ to\n *)adri/an
                    oi)kou=ntes kai\ pro\s a)llh/lous diafero/menoi, mu/drous diapu/rous
                    kataponti/santes e)n me/sw| tw=| pela/gei diwmo/santo mh\ spei/sesqai th\n pro\s
                    a)llh/lous e)/xqran pro/teron e(/ws a)\n ou(=toi qermoi\ a)nenexqw=sin. ou(/tw
                    de\ sklhrw=s o)mo/santes kai\ to\  ou)k
                    e)pinoh/santes u(/steron u(po\ tw=n pragma/twn a)nagkazo/menoi dielu/santo th\n
                    e)/xqran, e)a/santes tou\s mu/drous yuxrou\s e)n tw=| buqw=|. to\ de\ e)ggu/a, pa/ra d' a)/ta, tine\s u(pe/labon ga/mon
                    a)pagoreu/ein: th\n ga\r tou= ga/mou su/nqesin para\ toi=s plei/stois tw=n
                    *(ellh/nwn e)ggu/hn o)noma/zesqai, kai\ bebaiwth\s o( koino\s bi/os, e)n w(=|
                    plei=stai kai\ me/gistai gi/nontai sumforai\ dia\ ta\s gunai=kas. e)/nioi de/
                    fasin a)na/cion ei)=nai *xi/lwnos dia\ to\ mh\ du/nasqai a)nairoume/nou tou=
                    ga/mou diame/nein to\n bi/on, th\n de\ a)/thn a)pofai/nesqai parei=nai e)ggu/ais
                    tai=s e)pi\ tw=n sumbolai/wn kai\ tai=s u(pe\r tw=n a)/llwn diomologh/sesi peri\
                    xrhma/twn. kai\ *eu)ripi/dhs
                    e)/nioi de/ fasi
                    mh\ *xi/lwnos ei)=nai mhde\ politiko\n to\ mhdeni\ tw=n fi/lwn e)n tai=s
                    toiau/tais xrei/ais e)parkei=n, a)lla\ ma=llon ta\s katabebaiw/seis
                    a)pagoreu/ein kai\ to\ katatetame/nws e)ggua=sqai/ te kai\ diori/zesqai tw=n

                    peri\ diadoxh=s basile/wn. o(/ti *kroi=sos e)pi\ *ku=ron
                    to\n *pe/rshn e)kstrateu/wn e)pu/qeto tou= mantei/ou. o( de\ xrhsmo/s, o( de\ to\ a)mfi/bolon tou= xrhsmou= kata\ th\n e(autou= proai/resin
                    e)kdeca/menos e)dustu/xhsen. o(/ti pa/lin e)phrw/thsen, ei) polu\n xro/non e(/cei th\n
                    dunastei/an. ei)=pe de\ ta\ e)/ph tau=ta,o(/ti h(mi/onon to\n *ku=ron e)/fh dia\
                    to\ th\n mhte/ra au)tou= *mhdikh\n ei)=nai, to\n de\ pate/ra *pe/rshn.
                        o(/ti
                    *ku=ros o( tw=n *persw=n basileu\s paragenhqei\s meta\ pa/shs duna/mews ei)s ta\
                    th=s *kappadoki/as stena/, a)pe/steile kh/rukas pro\s to\n *kroi=son th/n te
                    dunastei/an au)tou= kataskeyome/nous kai\ dhlw/sontas o(/ti *ku=ros au)to\n
                    a)fi/hsi tw=n pro/teron a(marthma/twn kai\ *ludi/as kaqi/sthsi satra/phn, a)\n
                    e)pi\ qu/ras geno/menos o(moi/ws toi=s a)/llois o(mologh=| dou=los ei)=nai.
                    pro\s ou(\s o( *kroi=sos a)pekri/qh, dio/ti proshko/ntws a)\n *ku=ros kai\
                    *pe/rsai *kroi/sw| douleu/ein u(pome/noien: e)kei/nous me\n ga\r to\n
                    e)/mprosqen xro/non diateteleke/nai *mh/dois douleu/ontas, au)to\n de\
                    ou)de/pote pepoihke/nai to\ prostatto/menon u(f' e(te/rou.
                    o(/ti
                    *kroi=sos o( tw=n *ludw=n basileu\s prospoihsa/menos ei)s *delfou\s pe/mpein,
                    e)/pempen ei)s *pelopo/nnhson *eu)ru/baton to\n *)efe/sion, dou\s au)tw=|
                    xrusi/on, o(/pws w(s plei/stous cenologh/sh| tw=n *(ellh/nwn. o( de\ pemfqei\s
                    pro\s *ku=ron to\n *pe/rshn a)poxwrh/sas ta\ kata\ me/ros e)dh/lwse. dio\ kai\
                    para\ toi=s *(/ellhsin e)pish/mou genome/nhs th=s peri\ to\n *eu)ru/baton
                    ponhri/as, me/xri tou= nu=n, o(/tan tis o)neidi/sai tini\ bou/lhtai moxqhri/an,
                    *eu)ru/baton a)pokalei=.
                    o(/ti oi(
                    ponhroi\ ka)\n au)ti/ka para\ tw=n a)dikhqe/ntwn th\n timwri/an e)kkli/nwsin,
                    h(/ ge blasfhmi/a di' ai)w=nos throume/nh kai\ teleuth/santas au)tou\s kata\ to\
                    dunato\n mete/rxetai. o(/ti fasi\ to\n *kroi=son pro\ tou= pro\s *ku=ron pole/mou
                    pe/myai qewrou\s ei)s *delfou\s e)perwth/sontas, pw=s a)\n o( ui(o\s au)tou=
                    du/naito fwnh\n proe/sqai. th\n de\ *puqi/an ei)pei=n,
                    o(/ti dei= th\n
                    eu)tuxi/an metri/ws fe/rein kai\ mh\ pepoiqe/nai tai=s a)nqrwpi/nais
                    eu)praci/ais e)n mikra=| r(oph=| mega/las metabola\s lambanou/sais. o(/ti meta\ to\
                    gene/sqai ai)xma/lwton *kroi=son kai\ th\n pura\n sbesqh=nai, i)dw\n th\n po/lin
                    diarpazome/nhn kai\ pro\s toi=s a)/llois polu\n a)/rguro/n te kai\ xruso\n
                    diaforou/menon, e)phrw/thse to\n *ku=ron, ti/ poiou=sin oi( stratiw=tai. tou=
                    de\ meta\ ge/lwtos a)pokriqe/ntos, ta\ sa\ xrh/mata diarpa/zousi. ma\ *di/a me\n
                    ou)=n, ei)=pen, a)lla\ ta\ sa/: *kroi/sou ga\r i)/dion ou)ke/ti ou)qe\n
                    u(pa/rxei. o( de\ *ku=ros qauma/sas to\n lo/gon eu)qu\s meteno/hse kai\ tou\s
                    stratiw/tas a)nei/rcas th=s diarpagh=s ei)s to\ basiliko\n a)ne/labe ta\s tw=n
                    *sardianw=n kth/seis.
                    o(/ti
                    *ku=ros eu)sebh= nomi/sas ei)=nai to\n *kroi=son dia\ to\ katarragh=nai o)/mbron
                    kai\ sbe/sai th\n flo/ga, kai\ dia\ mnh/mhs e)/xwn th\n *so/lwnos a)po/krisin,
                    meq' e(autou= perih/geto to\n *kroi=son e)nti/mws. mete/dwke de\ au)tw=| kai\
                    tou= sunedri/ou, dialamba/nwn u(pa/rxein suneto/n, w(s a)\n polloi=s kai\
                    pepaideume/nois kai\ sofoi=s a)ndra/si sumbebiwko/ta.
                    o(/ti
                    *(/arpagos katastaqei\s u(po\ *ku/rou tou= *pe/rsou e)pi\ th=s qala/tths
                    strathgo/s, kai\ tw=n kata\ th\n *)asi/an *(ellh/nwn pro\s *ku=ron
                    diapresbeuome/nwn sunqe/sqai fili/an, ei)=pe pro\s au)tou\s o(/ti paraplh/sio/n
                    ti poiou=si tw=n pro/teron e(autw=| sumba/ntwn. kai\ ga/r pote gh=mai boulo/menon ai)tei=sqai para\ tou= patro\s th\n ko/rhn:
                    to\n de\ to\ me\n prw=ton ou)k a)/cion kri/nanta tou= ga/mou dunatwte/rw|
                    kategguh=sai, meta\ de\ tau=q' o(rw=nta au)to\n u(po\ tou= basile/ws timw/menon
                    dido/nai th\n qugate/ra: au)to\n de\ a)pokriqh=nai, dio/ti gunai=ka me\n
                    ou)ke/ti a)\n e)/xoi au)th/n, pallaki/da de\ sugxwrh/sai labei=n. dia\ de\ tw=n toiou/twn lo/gwn e)dh/lou toi=s
                    *(/ellhsin, o(/ti *ku/rou pro/teron a)ciou=ntos gene/sqai *persw=n fi/lous ou)k
                    e)boulh/qhsan, nu=n de\ e)k metabolh=s e)kei/nwn speudo/ntwn suna/yai fili/an
                    w(s me\n pro\s summa/xous ou) poih/setai ta\s o(mologi/as, w(s de\ dou/lous ei)s
                    th\n tw=n *persw=n pi/stin e(autou\s paradido/ntas prosde/cetai. o(/ti *lakedaimo/nioi punqano/menoi tou\s kata\ th\n *)asi/an
                    *(/ellhnas kinduneu/ein, e)/pemyan pro\s *ku=ron, o(/ti *lakedaimo/nioi
                    suggenei=s o)/ntes tw=n kata\ th\n *)asi/an *(ellh/nwn a)pagoreu/ousin au)tw=|
                    katadoulou=sqai ta\s *(ellhni/das po/leis. o( de\ qauma/sas to\n lo/gon e)/fh
                    gnw/sesqai th\n a)reth\n au)tw=n, o(/tan e(/na tw=n e(autou= dou/lwn pe/myh|
                    katastreyo/menon th\n *(ella/da. o(/ti *lakedaimo/nioi th\n *)arkadi/an me/llontes
                    katastre/fein e)/labon xrhsmo/n,
                    o(/ti oi(
                    *lakedaimo/nioi e)/pemyan ei)s *delfou\s peri\ tw=n o)ste/wn *)ore/stou tou=
                    *)agame/mnonos, e)n poi/w| tini\ to/pw| kei=ntai. kai\ e)/xrhsen ou(/tws,h)=n de\ xalkei=on, kai\ dhloi= ta\s fu/sas, tu/pon de\ to\n a)/kmona/
                    fhsi kai\ ta\s sfu/ras, ph=ma de\ e)pi\ ph/mati to\n si/dhron e)pi\ sidh/rw|:
                    ph=ma ga\r ei)/rhtai dia\ to\ e)pi\ kakw=| tw=n a)nqrw/pwn eu(rh=sqai.
                        krei=tton
                    ga\r ei)=nai teleuta=n h)\ zw=ntas e(autou\s meta\ tw=n suggenw=n e)fora=n
                    a)/cia qana/tou pra/ttontas. o(/ti kanhforou/shs pote\
                    th=s qugatro\s *peisistra/tou, kai\ dokou/shs tw=| ka/llei diafe/rein,
                    proselqw/n tis tw=n neani/skwn katapefronhkw\s e)fi/lhse th\n parqe/non.
                    a)kou/santes de\ oi( th=s ko/rhs a)delfoi\ bare/ws h)/negkan th\n u(/brin, kai\
                    to\n neani/skon a)gago/ntes pro\s to\n pate/ra di/khn h)ci/oun dido/nai: o( de\
                    *peisi/stratos gela/sas, kai\ ti/ tou\s misou=ntas h(ma=s, e)/fh, poih/swmen,
                    e)a\n tou\s filou=ntas timwri/ais periba/lwmen; o(/ti o( au)to\s diaporeuo/meno/s pote dia\
                    th=s xw/ras kateno/hsen a)/nqrwpon kata\ to\n *(/umhtton e)rgazo/menon e)n
                    xwri/ois leptoi=s kaq' u(perbolh\n kai\ traxe/si. qauma/sas de\ th\n filergi/an
                    e)/pemye tou\s e)rwth/sontas, ti/ lamba/noi toiau/thn xw/ran e)rgazo/menos.
                        w(=n poihsa/ntwn to\ prostaxqe/n, o(
                    e)rga/ths e)/fhse lamba/nein e)k tou= xwri/ou kaka\s o)du/nas, a)ll' ou)qe\n
                    au)tw=| me/lein: tou/twn ga\r to\  me/ros
                    *peisistra/tw| dido/nai. o( de\ duna/sths a)kou/sas to\n lo/gon kai\ gela/sas
                    e)poi/hse to\ xwri/on a)tele/s, kai\ e)nteu=qen h( paroimi/a, kai\ sfa/keloi
                    poiou=sin a)te/leian.

                    kai\ dianasta\s kai\ xwleu/wn dia\ to\ ptw=ma e)pexei/rhse fugei=n, a)pekta/nqh
                        de/.
                    o(/ti
                    *serou/ios *tu/llios o( *(rwmai/wn basileu\s e)basi/leusen e)/th tettara/konta
                    te/ttara, dia\ th=s i)di/as a)reth=s katwrqwkw\s ou)k o)li/ga tw=n koinw=n.
                        o(/ti e)p' a)/rxontos *)aqh/nhsi *qhrikle/ous kata\ th\n
                    e(chkosth\n prw/thn *)olumpia/da *puqago/ras o( filo/sofos e)gnwri/zeto,
                    prokekofw\s h)/dh e)n paidei/a|: ge/gone ga\r i(stori/as a)/cios, ei) kai/ tis
                    e(/teros tw=n peri\ paidei/an diatriya/ntwn. ge/gone de\ *sa/mios to\ ge/nos:
                    oi( de/ fasin o(/ti *turrhno/s. tosau/th d'
                    h)=n e)n toi=s au)tou= lo/gois peiqw\ kai\ xa/ris, w(s kai\ th=s po/lews sxedo\n
                    o(/lhs e)p' au)to\n e)pistrefou/shs kaq' h(me/ran w(sperei\ pro/s tinos qeou=
                    parousi/an a(/pantas suntre/xein e)pi\ th\n a)kro/asin. ou) mo/non de\ peri\ th\n e)n tw=| le/gein du/namin
                    e)fai/neto me/gas, a)lla\ kai\ yuxh=s e)ne/fainen h)=qos katestalme/non kai\
                    pro\s mi/mhsin bi/ou sw/fronos toi=s ne/ois qaumasto\n a)rxe/tupon, kai\ tou\s
                    e)ntugxa/nontas a)pe/trepen a)po\ th=s polutelei/as kai\ trufh=s, a(pa/ntwn dia\
                    th\n eu)pori/an a)ne/dhn e)kkexume/nwn ei)s a)/nesin kai\ diafqora\n a)gennh=
                    tou= sw/matos kai\ th=s yuxh=s. o(/ti *puqago/ras puqo/menos *fereku/dhn to\n
                    e)pista/thn au)tou= gegenhme/non e)n *dh/lw| nosei=n kai\ tele/ws e)sxa/tws

                    metasxo/ntas. o(/ti *kleini/as, *taranti=nos to\ ge/nos,
                    ei(=s de\ tw=n e)k tou= proeirhme/nou susth/matos w)/n, puqo/menos *prw=ron to\n
                    *kurhnai=on dia/ tina politikh\n peri/stasin a)polwleko/ta th\n ou)si/an kai\
                    tele/ws a)porou/menon, e)cedh/mhsen e)k th=s *)itali/as ei)s *kurh/nhn meta\
                    xrhma/twn i(kanw=n, kai\ th\n ou)si/an a)pokate/sthse tw=| proeirhme/nw|,
                    ou)de/pote tou=ton e(wrakw/s, a)kou/wn de\ mo/non o(/ti *puqago/reios h)=n.
                        kai\ a)/lloi de\ polloi\ to\ paraplh/sion
                    pepoihko/tes diamnhmoneu/ontai. ou) mo/non de\ e)n th=| tw=n xrhma/twn
                    e)pido/sei toiou/tous au(tou\s parei/xonto toi=s gnwri/mois, a)lla\ kai\ kata\
                    tou\s e)pisfalesta/tous kairou\s sunekindu/neuon. kai\ ga\r *dionusi/ou turannou=ntos *finti/as tis
                    *puqago/reios e)pibebouleukw\s tw=| tura/nnw|, me/llwn de\ th=s timwri/as

                    i)di/wn pro/teron a(\ bou/letai dioikh=sai: dw/sein d' e)/fhsen e)gguhth\n tou=
                    qana/tou tw=n fi/lwn e(/na. tou= de\ duna/stou

                    th=s e)sxa/ths tou= xro/nou r(oph=s dromai=os h)=lqe, tou= *da/mwnos

                    gumnasi/an e)poiou=nto, toiou=to/n tina tro/pon th=s mele/ths u(posthsa/menoi.
                    ou) pro/teron e)k th=s eu)nh=s h)gei/ronto, pri\n a)\n pro\s e(autou\s
                    a)nqwmologh/santo ta\ kata\ th\n prote/ran h(me/ran au)toi=s praxqe/nta, th\n

                    a)poba/llwmen kai\ tw=n a)dh/lwn o)rego/menoi tw=n fanerw=n mh\ kurieu/wmen.
                        ou)/ fhmi
                    katapeplh=xqai to\ me/geqos th=s tw=n *persw=n stratei/as: a)reth=| ga\r o(
                    po/lemos, ou) plh/qei brabeu/etai. pareilh/fasi ga\r u(po\ tw=n pate/rwn zh=n me\n
                    e(autoi=s, teleuta=n d' o(/tan xrei/a tai=s patri/sin e)ph=|. ti/ fobhqw=men to\n xruso\n
                    w(=| kekosmhme/noi badi/zousin ei)s ta\s ma/xas w(s gunai=kes ei)s tou\s
                    ga/mous, w(/ste th\n ni/khn mh\ mo/non e)/paqlon e)/xein do/can, a)lla\ kai\
                    plou=ton; ou) fobei=tai ga\r h( a)reth\ xruso/n, o(\n o( si/dhros ei)/wqen
                    a)/gein ai)xma/lwton, a)lla\ th\n strathgi/an tw=n h(goume/nwn. pa=sa ga\r du/namis
                    u(perai/rousa th\n summetri/an u(f' e(auth=s bla/ptetai ta\ plei=sta. pri\n h)\
                    ga\r a)kou=sai th\n fa/lagga, fqa/somen h(mei=s pra/cantes a(\ boulo/meqa.

cit.quote:
to\ teleutai=on pollai=s
                    geneai=s u(/steron e)k th=s *)itali/as to\ tw=n *sikelw=n e)/qnos pandhmei\
                    peraiwqe\n ei)s th\n *sikeli/an th\n u(po\ tw=n *sikanw=n e)kleifqei=san xw/ran
                    katw/|khsan. a)ei\ de\ th=| pleoneci/a| probaino/ntwn tw=n *sikelw=n, kai\ th\n
                    o(/moron porqou/ntwn, e)ge/nonto po/lemoi pleona/kis au)toi=s pro\s tou\s
                    *sikanou/s, e(/ws sunqh/kas poihsa/menoi sumfw/nous o(/rous e)/qento th=s
                    xw/ras: peri\ w(=n ta\ kata\ me/ros e)n toi=s oi)kei/ois xro/nois
                        a)nagra/yomen.

bibl.title: Alexandra
bibl.#text:
Tzetzes, on the
                             of Lycophron, v. 717.

p.#text:
*dio/dwros me/ntoi diafora\n tou/twn oi)=den e)n oi(=s le/gei, *sikanw=n kai\
                        *sikelw=n.
                    *dio/dwros de/ pou tw=n deka/twn bibli/wn
                    ei)pw\n peri/ te *sikelw=n kai\ *sikanw=n diafora\n oi)=den, w(s kai\
                    proerre/qh, *sikelou= kai\ *sikanou=.
                    *dio/dwros de\ o( *sikelo\s kai\ o( *)oppiano\s th\n *nea/polin u(f'
                    *(hrakle/ous oi)kisqh=nai/ fasi ktisqh=nai.
                    kai\ to\
                    *palla/dion de\ th=s *)aqhna=s toiou=ton h)=n tri/phxu, cu/linon, e)c ou)ranou=
                    katapeso/n, w(/s fasin, e)n *pesinou=nti th=s *frugi/as, o(/qen o( *dio/dwros
                    kai\ *di/wn to\n to/pon klhqh=nai/ fasin.
                    kai\
                    *dio/dwros a)/kran tina\ tw=n *)/alpewn korufh\n tou= su/mpantos o)/rous
                    dokou=san ou)ranou= r(a/xin i(storei= para\ tw=n e)gxwri/wn kalei=sqai.

head:
ta/de e)/nestin e)n th=| e(ndeka/th| tw=n *diodw/rou
                bi/blwn.

p:
peri\ th=s *ce/rcou
                    diaba/sews ei)s th\n *eu)rw/phn.

peri\ th=s ma/xhs
                    th=s e)n *qermopu/lais.

peri\ th=s *ce/rcou
                        naumaxi/as pro\s tou\s *(/ellhnas.

w(s
                    *qemistokle/ous katastrathgh/santos to\n *ce/rchn katenauma/xhsan oi( *(/ellhnes
                    tou\s barba/rous peri\ *salami=na.

w(s *ce/rchs
                    *mardo/nion strathgo
 a)polipw
 meta\ me/rous th=s duna/mews a)ph=ren ei)s
                    th
 *)asi/an.

w(s *karxhdo/nioi mega/lais
                        duna/mesin e)stra/teusan ei)s th\n *sikeli/an.

w(s
                    *ge/lwn katastrathgh/sas tou\s barba/rous tou\s me\n au)tw=n kate/koye, tou\s d'
                    e)zw/grhsen.

w(s *ge/lwn dehqe/ntwn
                    *karxhdoni/wn xrh/mata praca/menos sunexw/rhsen au)toi=s th\n
                    ei)rh/nhn.

kri/sis tw=n a)risteusa/ntwn
                        *(ellh/nwn e)n tw=| pole/mw|.

ma/xh tw=n
                    *(ellh/nwn pro\s *mardo/nion kai\ *pe/rsas peri\ *plataia\s kai\ ni/kh tw=n
                    *(ellh/nwn.

po/lemos *(rwmai/ois pro\s
                        *ai)kolanou\s kai\ tou\s to\ *tou=sklon katoikou=ntas.

peri\ th=s kataskeuh=s tou= *peiraie/ws u(po\
                            *qemistokle/ous.

peri\ th=s a)postalei/shs
                                bohqei/as *kumai/ois u(f' *(ie/rwnos tou= basile/ws.
peri\ tou= genome/nou pole/mou *taranti/nois pro\s   *)ia/pugas.

w(s *qrasudai=os o( *qh/rwnos me\n
                    ui(o/s, tu/rannos de\ *)akraganti/nwn, h(tthqei\s u(po\ *surakousi/wn a)pe/bale
                    th\n dunastei/an.

w(s *qemistoklh=s fugw\n pro\s
                        *ce/rchn kai\ kathgorhqei\s qana/tou h)leuqerw/qh.

w(s *)aqhnai=oi ta\s kata\ th\n *)asi/an *(ellhni/das po/leis
                        h)leuqe/rwsan.

peri\ tou= genome/nou seismou=
                    peri\ th\n *lakwnikh/n.

peri\ th=s a)posta/sews
                        tw=n *messhni/wn kai\ tw=n *ei(lw/twn a)po\ *lakedaimoni/wn.

w(s *)argei=oi *mukh/nas kataska/yantes a)oi/khton e)poi/hsan
                    th\n po/lin.

w(s th\n a)po\ *ge/lwnos basilei/an
                    kate/lusan oi( *surakou/sioi.

w(s *ce/rcou
                    dolofonhqe/ntos *)artace/rchs e)basi/leusen.

peri\
                        th=s a)posta/sews tw=n *ai)gupti/wn a)po\ *persw=n.
peri\ sta/sewn tw=n genome/nwn e)n tai=s *surakou/sais.

w(s *)aqhnai=oi *ai)ginh/tas kai\ *korinqi/ous
                        katepole/mhsan.

w(s *fwkei=s pro\s *dwriei=s
                        e)pole/mhsan.

w(s *murwni/dhs o( *)aqhnai=os
                            o)li/gois stratiw/tais *boiwtou\s pollaplasi/ous o)/ntas e)ni/khsen.

peri\ th=s *tolmi/dou stratei/as ei)s
                        *kefallhni/an.

peri\ tou= genome/nou pole/mou
                            kata\ th\n *sikeli/an *)egestai/ois kai\ *lilubai/ois.

peri\ tou= nomoqethqe/ntos e)n *surakou/sais
                        petalismou=.

stratei/a *perikle/ous ei)s
                        *pelopo/nnhson.

stratei/a *surakousi/wn ei)s
                        *turrhni/an.

peri\ tw=n e)n *sikeli/a|
                    *palikw=n o)nomazome/nwn.

peri\ th=s *douketi/ou
                    h(/tths kai\ th=s peri\ au)to\n parado/cou swthri/as.

l: eu)kleh\s me\n a( tu/xa, kalo\s d' o( po/tmos,
bwmo\s d' o( ta/fos, pro\ go/wn de\ mna=stis, o( d' oi)=tos e)/painos.
e)nta/fion de\ toiou=ton ou)/t' eu)rw\s
ou)/q' o( pandama/twr a)maurw/sei xro/nos.
a)ndrw=n a)gaqw=n o(/de shko\s oi)ke/tan eu)doci/an
*(ella/dos ei(/leto. marturei= de\ kai\ *lewni/das
o( *spa/rtas basileu/s, a)reta=s me/gan leloipw\s
ko/smon a)e/nao/n te kle/os.

l.#text: mna=ma/ t' a)leca/ndrou pole/mou kai\ ma/rtura ni/kas

l: *delfoi/ me sta=san, *zani\ xarizo/menoi
su\n *foi/bw|, ptoli/porqon a)pwsame/nois sti/xa *mh/dwn
kai\ xalkoste/fanon r(usame/nois te/menos.
doulosu/nhs stugera=s r(usa/menoi po/lias.
e)k *peloponnh/sou xilia/des te/tores,
kei/meqa toi=s kei/nwn peiqo/menoi nomi/mois.

l.#text: e)c ou(= g' *eu)rw/phn *)asi/as di/xa po/ntos e)/neime

l: kai\ po/lias qnhtw=n qou=ros *)/arhs e)pe/xei,
ou)de/n pw toiou=ton e)pixqoni/wn ge/net' a)ndrw=n
e)/rgon e)n h)pei/rw| kai\ kata\ po/nton a(/ma.
oi(/de ga\r e)n *ku/prw| *mh/dous pollou\s o)le/santes
*foini/kwn e(kato\n nau=s e(/lon e)n pela/gei
a)ndrw=n plhqou/sas, me/ga d' e)/stenen *)asi\s u(p' au)tw=n
plhgei=s' a)mfote/rais xersi\ kra/tei pole/mou.

p.#text:
h( me\n ou)=n pro\ tau/ths bi/blos, th=s o(/lhs
                    sunta/cews ou)=sa deka/th, to\ te/los e)/sxe tw=n pra/cewn ei)s to\n
                    prohgou/menon e)niauto\n th=s *ce/rcou diaba/sews ei)s th\n *eu)rw/phn kai\ ei)s
                    ta\s genome/nas dhmhgori/as e)n th=| koinh=| suno/dw| tw=n *(ellh/nwn e)n
                    *kori/nqw| peri\ th=s *ge/lwnos summaxi/as toi=s *(/ellhsin: e)n tau/th| de\ to\
                    sunexe\s th=s i(stori/as a)naplhrou=ntes a)rco/meqa me\n a)po\ th=s *ce/rcou
                    stratei/as e)pi\ tou\s *(/ellhnas, katalh/comen de\ e)pi\ to\n prohgou/menon
                    e)niauto\n th=s *)aqhnai/wn stratei/as e)pi\ *ku/pron h(goume/nou *ki/mwnos.
                        e)p'
                    a)/rxontos ga\r *)aqh/nhsi *kallia/dou *(rwmai=oi kate/sthsan u(pa/tous
                    *spo/rion *ka/ssion kai\ *pro/klon *ou)ergi/nion *tri/koston, h)/xqh de\ kai\
                    par' *)hlei/ois *)olumpia\s pe/mpth pro\s tai=s e(bdomh/konta, kaq' h(\n e)ni/ka
                    sta/dion *)astu/los *surako/sios. e)pi\ de\ tou/twn *ce/rchs o( basileu\s
                    e)stra/teusen e)pi\ th\n *(ella/da dia\ tau/thn th\n ai)ti/an. *mardo/nios o( *pe/rshs a)neyio\s me\n kai\ khdesth\s h)=n
                    *ce/rcou, dia\ de\ su/nesin kai\ a)ndrei/an ma/lista qaumazo/menos para\ toi=s
                    *pe/rsais. ou(=tos mete/wros w)\n tw=| fronh/mati kai\ th\n h(liki/an a)kma/zwn,
                    e)pequ/mei mega/lwn duna/mewn a)fhgh/sasqai: dio/per e)/peise to\n *ce/rchn
                    katadoulw/sasqai tou\s *(/ellhnas, a)ei\ polemikw=s e)/xontas pro\s tou\s
                    *pe/rsas. o( de\ *ce/rchs peisqei\s au)tw=|
                    kai\ boulo/menos pa/ntas tou\s *(/ellhnas a)nasta/tous poih=sai, diepresbeu/sato
                    pro\s *karxhdoni/ous peri\ koinopragi/as kai\ sune/qeto pro\s au)tou/s, w(/ste
                    au)to\n me\n e)pi\ tou\s th\n *(ella/da katoikou=ntas *(/ellhnas strateu/ein,
                    *karxhdoni/ous de\ toi=s au)toi=s xro/nois mega/las paraskeua/sasqai duna/meis
                    kai\ katapolemh=sai tw=n *(ellh/nwn tou\s peri\ *sikeli/an kai\ *)itali/an
                    oi)kou=ntas. a)kolou/qws ou)=n tai=s sunqh/kais
                    *karxhdo/nioi me\n xrhma/twn plh=qos a)qroi/santes misqofo/rous sunh=gon e)/k te
                    th=s *)itali/as kai\ *ligustikh=s, e)/ti de\ *galati/as kai\ *)ibhri/as, pro\s
                    de\ tou/tois e)k th=s *libu/hs a(pa/shs kai\ th=s *karxhdo/nos kate/grafon
                    politika\s duna/meis: te/los de\ trieth= xro/non peri\ ta\s paraskeua\s
                    a)sxolhqe/ntes h)/qroisan pezw=n me\n u(pe\r ta\s tria/konta muria/das, nau=s
                    de\ diakosi/as. o( de\ *ce/rchs a(millw/menos pro\s th\n tw=n *karxhdoni/wn spoudh/n,
                    u(pereba/leto pa/sais tai=s paraskeuai=s tosou=ton o(/son kai\ tw=| plh/qei tw=n
                    e)qnw=n u(perei=xe *karxhdoni/wn. h)/rcato de\ nauphgei=sqai kata\ pa=san th\n
                    paraqala/ttion th\n u(p' au)to\n tattome/nhn, *ai)/gupto/n te kai\ *foini/khn
                    kai\ *ku/pron, pro\s de\ tou/tois *kiliki/an kai\ *pamfuli/an kai\ *pisidikh/n,
                    e)/ti de\ *luki/an kai\ *kari/an kai\ *musi/an kai\ *trw|a/da kai\ ta\s e)f'
                    *(ellhspo/ntw| po/leis kai\ th\n *biquni/an kai\ to\n *po/nton. o(moi/ws de\
                    toi=s *karxhdoni/ois trieth= xro/non paraskeuasa/menos kateskeu/ase nau=s
                    makra\s plei/ous tw=n xili/wn kai\ diakosi/wn. suneba/leto de\ au)tw=| kai\ o( path\r *darei=os, pro\ th=s teleuth=s
                    paraskeua\s pepoihme/nos mega/lwn duna/mewn: kai\ ga\r e)kei=nos h(tthme/nos
                    u(po\ *)aqhnai/wn e)n *maraqw=ni *da/tidos h(goume/nou, xalepw=s die/keito pro\s
                    tou\s nenikhko/tas *)aqhnai/ous. a)lla\ *darei=os me\n me/llwn h)/dh diabai/nein
                    e)pi\ tou\s *(/ellhnas e)mesolabh/qh teleuth/sas, o( de\ *ce/rchs dia/ te th\n
                    tou= patro\s e)pibolh\n kai\ th\n tou= *mardoni/ou sumbouli/an, kaqo/ti
                    proei/rhtai, die/gnw polemei=n toi=s *(/ellhsin. w(s d' au)tw=| pa/nta ta\ pro\s th\n stratei/an h(toi/masto, toi=s me\n
                    naua/rxois parh/ggeilen a)qroi/zein ta\s nau=s ei)s *ku/mhn kai\ *fw/kaian,
                    au)to\s d' e)c a(pasw=n tw=n satrapeiw=n sunagagw\n ta\s peza\s kai\ i(ppika\s
                    duna/meis, proh=gen e)k tw=n *sou/swn. w(s d' h(=ken ei)s *sa/rdeis, kh/rukas
                    e)ce/pemyen ei)s th\n *(ella/da, prosta/cas ei)s pa/sas ta\s po/leis i)e/nai
                    kai\ tou\s *(/ellhnas ai)tei=n u(/dwr kai\ gh=n. th\n de\ stratia\n dielo/menos e)cape/steile tou\s i(kanou\s zeu=cai me\n to\n
                    *(ellh/sponton, diaska/yai de\ to\n *)/aqw kata\ to\n au)xe/na th=s
                    *xerronh/sou, a(/ma me\n tai=s duna/mesin a)sfalh= kai\ su/ntomon th\n die/codon
                    poiou/menos, a(/ma de\ tw=| mege/qei tw=n e)/rgwn e)lpi/zwn prokataplh/cesqai
                    tou\s *(/ellhnas. oi( me\n ou)=n pemfqe/ntes e)pi\ th\n kataskeuh\n tw=n e)/rgwn
                    taxe/ws h)/nuon dia\ th\n poluxeiri/an tw=n e)rgazome/nwn. oi( d' *(/ellhnes puqo/menoi to\ me/geqos th=s tw=n *persw=n
                    duna/mews, e)ce/pemyan ei)s *qettali/an muri/ous o(pli/tas tou\s katalhyome/nous
                    ta\s peri\ ta\ *te/mph paro/dous: h(gei=to de\ tw=n me\n *lakedaimoni/wn
                    *suneto/s, tw=n de\ *)aqhnai/wn *qemistoklh=s. ou(=toi de\ pro\s ta\s po/leis
                    presbeuta\s a)postei/lantes h)ci/oun a)poste/llein stratiw/tas tou\s koinh=|
                    fula/contas ta\s paro/dous: e)/speudon ga\r a(pa/sas ta\s *(ellhni/das po/leis
                    dialabei=n tai=s profulakai=s kai\ koinopoih/sasqai to\n pro\s tou\s *pe/rsas
                    po/lemon. e)pei\ de\ tw=n *qettalw=n kai\ tw=n
                    a)/llwn *(ellh/nwn tw=n plhsioxw/rwn tai=s paro/dois e)/dwkan oi( plei/ous
                    u(/dwr te kai\ gh=n toi=s a)figme/nois a)gge/lois a)po\ *ce/rcou, a)pogno/ntes
                    th\n peri\ ta\ *te/mph fulakh\n e)panh=lqon ei)s th\n oi)kei/an. xrh/simon de\ diori/sai tw=n *(ellh/nwn tou\s ta\ tw=n
                    barba/rwn e(lome/nous, i(/na tugxa/nontes o)nei/dous a)potre/pwsi tai=s
                    blasfhmi/ais tou\s prodo/tas a)\n genome/nous th=s koinh=s e)leuqeri/as.
                        *ai)nia=nes me\n ou)=n kai\ *do/lopes kai\
                    *mhliei=s kai\ *perraiboi\ kai\ *ma/gnhtes meta\ tw=n barba/rwn e)ta/xqhsan,
                    e)/ti parou/shs th=s e)n toi=s *te/mpesi fulakh=s, *)axaioi\ de\ *fqiw=tai kai\
                    *lokroi\ kai\ *qettaloi\ kai\ *boiwtoi\ oi( plei/ous tou/twn a)pelqo/ntwn
                    a)pe/klinan pro\s tou\s barba/rous. oi( d' e)n
                    *)isqmw=| sunedreu/ontes tw=n *(ellh/nwn e)yhfi/santo tou\s me\n e)qelonti\ tw=n
                    *(ellh/nwn e(lome/nous ta\ *persw=n dekateu=sai toi=s qeoi=s, e)pa\n tw=|
                    pole/mw| krath/swsi, pro\s de\ tou\s th\n h(suxi/an e)/xontas e)kpe/myai
                    pre/sbeis tou\s parakale/sontas sunagwni/zesqai peri\ th=s koinh=s e)leuqeri/as.
                        w(=n oi( me\n ei(/lonto gnhsi/ws th\n
                    summaxi/an, oi( de\ parh=gon e)f' i(kano\n xro/non, a)ntexo/menoi th=s i)di/as
                    mo/non a)sfalei/as kai\ karadokou=ntes to\ tou= pole/mou te/los: *)argei=oi de\
                    pre/sbeis a)postei/lantes ei)s to\ koino\n sune/drion e)phgge/llonto
                    summaxh/sein, e)a\n au)toi=s me/ros ti th=s h(gemoni/as sugxwrh/swsin.
                        oi(=s oi( su/nedroi diesa/fhsan, ei) me\n
                    deino/teron h(gou=ntai to\ strathgo\n e)/xein *(/ellhna h)\ despo/thn ba/rbaron,
                    o)rqw=s au)tou\s e)/xein h(suxi/an, ei) de\ filotimou=ntai labei=n th\n tw=n
                    *(ellh/nwn h(gemoni/an, a)/cia tau/ths dei=n e)/fasan au)tou\s pepraxo/tas
                    e)pizhtei=n th\n thlikau/thn do/can. meta\ de\ tau=ta tw=n para\ *ce/rcou
                    pre/sbewn e)pio/ntwn th\n *(ella/da kai\ gh=n kai\ u(/dwr ai)tou/ntwn, ai(
                    po/leis a(/pasai dia\ tw=n a)pokri/sewn a)pedei/knunto th\n peri\ th=s koinh=s
                    e)leuqeri/as spoudh/n. *ce/rchs de\ w(s e)pu/qeto to\n *(ellh/sponton e)zeu=xqai kai\
                    to\n *)/aqw dieska/fqai, proh=gen e)k tw=n *sa/rdewn e)f' *(ellhspo/ntou th\n
                    porei/an poiou/menos: w(s de\ h(=ken ei)s *)/abudon, dia\ tou= zeu/gmatos th\n
                    du/namin dih/gagen ei)s th\n *eu)rw/phn. poreuo/menos de\ dia\ th=s *qra/|khs
                    pollou\s proselamba/neto stratiw/tas kai\ tw=n *qra|kw=n kai\ tw=n o(mo/rwn
                    tou/tois *(ellh/nwn. w(s d' h(=ken ei)s to\n
                    o)nomazo/menon *dori/skon, e)ntau=qa metepe/myato to\ nautiko/n, w(/ste
                    a)mfote/ras ta\s duna/meis ei)s e(/na to/pon a)qroisqh=nai. e)poih/sato de\ kai\
                    to\n e)cetasmo\n th=s stratia=s a(pa/shs: h)riqmh/qhsan de\ th=s pezh=s
                    duna/mews muria/des plei/ous tw=n o)gdoh/konta, nh=es de\ ai( su/mpasai makrai\
                    plei/ous tw=n xili/wn kai\ diakosi/wn, kai\ tou/twn *(ellhni/des triako/siai
                    kai\ ei)/kosi, ta\ me\n plhrw/mata tw=n a)ndrw=n parexome/nwn tw=n *(ellh/nwn,
                    ta\ de\ ska/fh tou= basile/ws xorhgou=ntos: ai( de\ loipai\ pa=sai barbarikai\
                    kathriqmou=nto: kai\ tou/twn *ai)gu/ptioi me\n diakosi/as pare/sxonto,
                    *foi/nikes de\ triakosi/as, *ki/likes de\ o)gdoh/konta, *pa/mfuloi de\

                    a)/rxontos d' *)aqh/nhsi *swsistra/tou *(rwmai=oi me\n u(pa/tous kate/sthsan
                    *pou/plion *ou)ale/rion *popliko/lan kai\ *ga/ion *klw/dion *(rh/gillon. e)pi\
                    de\ tou/twn *tolmi/dhs me\n peri\ th\n *boiwti/an die/triben, *)aqhnai=oi de\
                    *perikle/a to\n *canqi/ppou, tw=n a)gaqw=n a)ndrw=n, strathgo\n kate/sthsan,
                    kai\ do/ntes au)tw=| trih/reis penth/konta kai\ xili/ous o(pli/tas e)ce/pemyan
                    e)pi\ th\n *pelopo/nnhson. ou(=tos de\ th=s
                    *peloponnh/sou pollh\n e)po/rqhsen, ei)s de\ th\n *)akarnani/an diaba\s plh\n
                    *oi)niadw=n a(pa/sas ta\s po/leis proshga/geto. oi( me\n ou)=n *)aqhnai=oi kata\
                    tou=ton to\n e)niauto\n plei/stwn po/lewn h)=rcan, e)p' a)ndrei/a| de\ kai\
                    strathgi/a| mega/lhn do/can katekth/santo. e)p'
                    a)/rxontos d' *)aqh/nhsin *)ari/stwnos *(rwmai=oi me\n kate/sthsan u(pa/tous
                    *ko/inton *fa/bion *ou)iboulano\n kai\ *leu/kion *kornh/lion *kouriti=non. e)pi\
                    de\ tou/twn *)aqhnai/ois kai\ *peloponnhsi/ois pentaetei=s e)ge/nonto spondai/,
                    *ki/mwnos tou= *)aqhnai/ou sunqeme/nou tau/tas. kata\ de\ th\n *sikeli/an *)egestai/ois kai\ *lilubai/tais e)ne/sth po/lemos
                    peri\ xw/ras th=s pro\s tw=| *maza/rw| potamw=|: genome/nhs de\ ma/xhs i)sxura=s
                    sune/bh pollou\s par' a)mfote/rois a)naireqh=nai kai\ th=s filotimi/as mh\
                    lh=cai ta\s po/leis. meta\ de\ th\n
                    politografi/an th\n e)n tai=s po/lesi genome/nhn kai\ to\n a)nadasmo\n th=s
                    xw/ras, pollw=n ei)kh=| kai\ w(s e)/tuxe pepolitografhme/nwn, e)no/soun ai(
                    po/leis kai\ pa/lin ei)s politika\s sta/seis kai\ taraxa\s e)ne/pipton: ma/lista
                    de\ to\ kako\n e)pepo/lasen e)n tai=s *surakou/sais. *tundari/dhs ga/r tis tou)/noma, qra/sous kai\ to/lmhs
                    ge/mwn a)/nqrwpos, to\ me\n prw=ton pollou\s tw=n penh/twn a)nela/mbane, kai\
                    swmatopoiw=n tou/tous e(autw=| pro\s turanni/da e(toi/mous e)poi/ei dorufo/rous.
                    meta\ de\ tau=ta h)/dh fanero\s w)\n o(/ti dunastei/as o)re/getai, qana/tou
                    kri/sin u(posxw\n katedika/sqh. a)pagome/nou
                    de\ ei)s to\ desmwth/rion oi( poluwrhqe/ntes u(p' au)tou= sunestra/fhsan kai\
                    toi=s a)pa/gousi ta\s xei=ras e)pe/feron. taraxh=s de\ genome/nhs kata\ th\n
                    po/lin, sunestra/fhsan oi( xarie/statoi tw=n politw=n, kai\ tou\s newteri/santas
                    sunarpa/santes a(/ma tw=| *tundari/dh| a)nei=lon. pleona/kis de\ tou/tou
                    ginome/nou, kai\ tw=n a)ndrw=n turanni/dos e)piqumou/ntwn, o( dh=mos e)phne/xqh
                    mimh/sasqai tou\s *)aqhnai/ous, kai\ no/mon qei=nai paraplh/sion tw=| par'
                    e)kei/nois gegramme/nw| peri\ o)strakismou=. para\ ga\r *)aqhnai/ois e(/kaston tw=n
                    politw=n e)/dei gra/fein ei)s o)/strakon tou)/noma tou= dokou=ntos ma/lista
                    du/nasqai turannei=n tw=n politw=n, para\ de\ toi=s *surakosi/ois ei)s pe/talon
                    e)lai/as gra/fesqai to\n dunatw/taton tw=n politw=n, diariqmhqe/ntwn de\ tw=n
                    peta/lwn to\n plei=sta pe/tala labo/nta feu/gein pentaeth= xro/non. tou/tw| ga\r tw=| tro/pw| diela/mbanon tapeinw/sein
                    ta\ fronh/mata tw=n plei=ston i)sxuo/ntwn e)n tai=s patri/si: kaqo/lou ga\r ou)
                    ponhri/as kola/seis e)la/mbanon para\ tw=n paranomou/ntwn, a)lla\ duna/mews kai\
                    au)ch/sews tw=n a)ndrw=n e)poi/oun tapei/nwsin. oi( me\n ou)=n *)aqhnai=oi
                    tou=to to\ ge/nos th=s nomoqesi/as w)no/masan a)po\ tou= sumbebhko/tos
                    o)strakismo/n, oi( de\ *surako/sioi petalismo/n. ou(=tos de\ o( no/mos die/meine para\ me\n toi=s *)aqhnai/ois e)pi\ polu\n
                    xro/non, para\ de\ toi=s *surakosi/ois katelu/qh taxu\ dia\ toiau/tas tina\s
                    ai)ti/as. tw=n megi/stwn a)ndrw=n
                    fugadeuome/nwn oi( xarie/statoi tw=n politw=n kai\ duna/menoi dia\ th=s i)di/as
                    a)reth=s polla\ tw=n koinw=n e)panorqou=n a)fi/stanto tw=n dhmosi/wn pra/cewn,
                    kai\ dia\ to\n a)po\ tou= no/mou fo/bon i)diwteu/ontes diete/loun,
                    e)pimelo/menoi de\ th=s i)di/as ou)si/as ei)s trufh\n a)pe/klinon, oi( de\
                    ponhro/tatoi tw=n politw=n kai\ to/lmh| diafe/rontes e)fro/ntizon tw=n dhmosi/wn
                    kai\ ta\ plh/qh pro\s taraxh\n kai\ newterismo\n proetre/ponto. dio/per sta/sewn ginome/nwn pa/lin, kai\ tw=n pollw=n ei)s
                    diafora\s e)ktrepome/nwn, pa/lin h( po/lis ei)s sunexei=s kai\ mega/las
                    e)ne/pipte taraxa/s: e)pepo/laze ga\r dhmagwgw=n plh=qos kai\ sukofantw=n, kai\
                    lo/gou deino/ths u(po\ tw=n newte/rwn h)skei=to, kai\ kaqo/lou polloi\ ta\
                    fau=la tw=n e)pithdeuma/twn a)nti\ th=s palaia=s kai\ spoudai/as a)gwgh=s
                    h)lla/ttonto, kai\ tai=s me\n ou)si/ais dia\ th\n ei)rh/nhn proe/kopton, th=s d'
                    o(monoi/as kai\ tou= dikaiopragei=n o)li/gh tis e)gi/neto fronti/s. dio/per oi( *surako/sioi metagno/ntes to\n peri\ tou=
                    petalismou= no/mon kate/lusan, o)li/gon xro/non au)tw=| xrhsa/menoi. kai\ ta\
                    me\n kata\ th\n *sikeli/an e)n tou/tois h)=n. e)p'
                    a)/rxontos d' *)aqh/nhsi *lusikra/tous e)n *(rw/mh| katesta/qhsan u(/patoi
                    *ga/ios *nau/tios *(rou/tilos kai\ *leu/kios *minou/kios *karoutiano/s. e)pi\
                    de\ tou/twn *periklh=s o( tw=n *)aqhnai/wn strathgo\s a)poba\s ei)s
                    *pelopo/nnhson e)dh/|wse th\n tw=n *sikuwni/wn xw/ran. e)pecelqo/ntwn d' e)p' au)to\n tw=n *sikuwni/wn pandhmei\
                    kai\ ma/xhs genome/nhs, o( *periklh=s nikh/sas kai\ pollou\s kata\ th\n fugh\n
                    a)nelw\n kate/kleisen au)tou\s ei)s poliorki/an. prosbola\s de\ poiou/menos
                    toi=s tei/xesi, kai\ mh\ duna/menos e(lei=n th\n po/lin, e)/ti de\ kai\ tw=n
                    *lakedaimoni/wn a)posteila/ntwn boh/qeian toi=s poliorkoume/nois, a)ne/zeucen
                    e)k th=s *sikuw=nos: ei)s de\ th\n *)akarnani/an pleu/sas kai\ th\n tw=n
                    *oi)niadw=n xw/ran katadramw\n kai\ lafu/rwn plh=qos a)qroi/sas, a)pe/pleusen
                    e)k th=s *)akarnani/as. meta\ de\ tau=ta
                    e)lqw\n ei)s *xerro/nhson xili/ois tw=n politw=n kateklhrou/xhse th\n xw/ran.
                    a(/ma de\ tou/tois prattome/nois *tolmi/dhs o( e(/teros strathgo\s ei)s th\n
                    *eu)/boian parelqw\n a)/llois xili/ois poli/tais tau/thn kai\ th\n tw=n *naci/wn
                    gh=n die/neime. kata\ de\ th\n *sikeli/an
                    *turrhnw=n lh|zome/nwn th\n qa/lattan, oi( *surako/sioi nau/arxon e(lo/menoi
                    *fa/u+llon e)/pemyan ei)s th\n *turrhni/an. ou(=tos d' e)kpleu/sas to\ me\n
                    prw=ton nh=son th\n o)nomazome/nhn *ai)qa/leian e)po/rqhse, para\ de\ tw=n
                    *turrhnw=n la/qra| xrh/mata labw/n, a)pe/pleusen ei)s th\n *sikeli/an ou)de\n
                    a)/cion mnh/mhs diapraca/menos. oi( de\
                    *surako/sioi tou=ton me\n w(s prodo/thn katadika/santes e)fuga/deusan, e(/teron
                    de\ strathgo\n katasth/santes *)apellh=n e)cape/steilan e)pi\ *turrhnou\s
                    e)/xonta trih/reis e(ch/konta. ou(=tos de\ th\n paraqala/ttion *turrhni/an
                    katadramw/n, a)ph=ren ei)s *ku/rnon katexome/nhn u(po\ *turrhnw=n kat'
                    e)kei/nous tou\s xro/nous: porqh/sas de\ plei=sta th=s nh/sou kai\ th\n
                    *ai)qa/leian xeirwsa/menos, e)panh=lqen ei)s ta\s *surakou/sas ai)xmalw/twn te
                    plh=qos komi/zwn kai\ th\n a)/llhn w)fe/leian a)/gwn ou)k o)li/ghn. meta\ de\ tau=ta *douke/tios o( tw=n *sikelw=n
                    a)fhgou/menos ta\s po/leis a(pa/sas ta\s o(moeqnei=s plh\n th=s *(/ublas ei)s
                    mi/an kai\ koinh\n h)/gage sunte/leian, drastiko\s d' w)\n newte/rwn w)re/geto
                    pragma/twn, kai\ para\ tou= koinou= tw=n *sikelw=n a)qroi/sas du/namin
                    a)cio/logon ta\s *me/nas, h(/tis h)=n au)tou= patri/s, metw/|kisen ei)s to\
                    pedi/on, kai\ plhsi/on tou= teme/nous tw=n o)nomazome/nwn *palikw=n e)/ktise
                    po/lin a)cio/logon, h(\n a)po\ tw=n proeirhme/nwn qew=n w)no/maze *palikh/n.
                        e)pei\ de\ peri\ tw=n qew=n tou/twn
                    e)mnh/sqhmen, ou)k a)/cio/n e)sti paralipei=n th\n peri\ to\ i(ero\n
                    a)rxaio/thta/ te kai\ th\n a)pisti/an kai\ to\ su/nolon to\ peri\ tou\s
                    o)nomazome/nous krath=ras i)di/wma. muqologou=si ga\r to\ te/menos tou=to
                    diafe/rein tw=n a)/llwn a)rxaio/thti kai\ sebasmw=|, pollw=n e)n au)tw=|
                    parado/cwn paradedome/nwn. prw=ton me\n ga\r
                    krath=re/s ei)si tw=| mege/qei me\n ou) kata\ pa=n mega/loi, phga\s d'
                    e)caisi/ous a)naba/llontes e)c a)muqh/tou te buqou= kai\ paraplh/sion e)/xontes
                    th\n fu/sin toi=s le/bhsi toi=s u(po\ puro\s pollou= kaome/nois kai\ to\ u(/dwr
                    dia/puron a)naba/llousin. e)/mfasin me\n ou)=n
                    e)/xei to\ a)naballo/menon u(/dwr w(s u(pa/rxei dia/puron, ou) mh\n a)kribh=
                    th\n e)pi/gnwsin e)/xei dia\ to\ mhde/na tolma=n a(/yasqai tou/tou: thlikau/thn
                    ga\r e)/xei kata/plhcin h( tw=n u(grw=n a)nabolh\ w(/ste dokei=n u(po\ qei/as
                    tino\s a)na/gkhs gi/nesqai to\ sumbai=non. to\
                    me\n ga\r u(/dwr qei/ou katako/rou th\n o)/sfrhsin e)/xei, to\ de\ xa/sma
                    bro/mon polu\n kai\ fobero\n e)ci/hsi: to\ de\ tou/twn paradoco/teron, ou)/te
                    u(perekxei=tai to\ u(gro\n ou)/te a)polei/pei, ki/nhsin de\ kai\ bi/an
                    r(eu/matos ei)s u(/yos e)cairome/nhn e)/xei qauma/sion. toiau/ths de\ qeoprepei/as ou)/shs peri\ to\ te/menos, oi(
                    me/gistoi tw=n o(/rkwn e)ntau=qa suntelou=ntai, kai\ toi=s e)piorkh/sasi
                    sunto/mws h( tou= daimoni/ou ko/lasis a)kolouqei=: tine\s ga\r th=s o(ra/sews
                    sterhqe/ntes th\n e)k tou= teme/nous a)/fodon poiou=ntai. mega/lhs d' ou)/shs deisidaimoni/as, oi( ta\s
                    a)mfisbhth/seis e)/xontes, o(/tan u(po/ tinos u(peroxh=s katisxu/wntai, th=|
                    dia\ tw=n o(/rkwn tou/twn a)nakri/sei kri/nontai. e)/sti de\ tou=to to\ te/menos
                    e)/k tinwn xro/nwn a)/sulon tethrhme/non, kai\ toi=s a)tuxou=sin oi)ke/tais kai\
                    kuri/ois a)gnw/mosi peripeptwko/si pollh\n pare/xetai boh/qeian: tou\s ga\r ei)s tou=to katafugo/ntas ou)k e)/xousin
                    e)cousi/an oi( despo/tai biai/ws a)pa/gein, kai\ me/xri tou/tou diame/nousin
                    a)sinei=s, me/xri a)\n e)pi\ diwrisme/nois filanqrw/pois pei/santes oi( ku/rioi
                    kai\ do/ntes dia\ tw=n o(/rkwn ta\s peri\ tw=n o(mologiw=n pi/steis a)paga/gwsi.
                        kai\ ou)dei\s i(storei=tai tw=n dedwko/twn
                    toi=s oi)ke/tais pi/stin tau/thn paraba/s: ou(/tw ga\r h( tw=n qew=n
                    deisidaimoni/a tou\s o)mo/santas pro\s tou\s dou/lous pistou\s poiei=. e)/sti
                    de\ kai\ to\ te/menos e)n pedi/w| qeoprepei= kei/menon kai\ stoai=s kai\ tai=s
                    a)/llais katalu/sesin i(kanw=s kekosmhme/non. peri\ me\n ou)=n tou/twn i(kanw=s
                    h(mi=n ei)rh/sqw, pro\s de\ th\n sunexh= toi=s proi+storhme/nois dih/ghsin
                    e)pa/nimen. o( ga\r *douke/tios th\n *palikh\n kti/sas
                    kai\ perilabw\n au)th\n a)ciolo/gw| tei/xei, kateklhrou/xhse th\n o(/moron
                    xw/ran. sune/bh de\ th\n po/lin tau/thn dia\ th\n th=s xw/ras a)reth\n kai\ dia\
                    to\ plh=qos tw=n oi)khto/rwn taxei=an labei=n au)/chsin. ou) polu\n de\ xro/non eu)daimonh/sasa kateska/fh, kai\
                    die/meinen a)oi/khtos me/xri tw=n kaq' h(ma=s xro/nwn: peri\ w(=n ta\ kata\
                    me/ros a)nagra/yomen e)n toi=s oi)kei/ois xro/nois. kai\ ta\ me\n kata\ th\n
                    *sikeli/an e)n tou/tois h)=n. kata\ de\ th\n *)itali/an meta\ th\n kataskafh\n
                    th=s *suba/rews u(po\ tw=n *krotwniatw=n u(/steron e)/tesin o)ktw\ pro\s toi=s
                    penth/konta *qettalo\s sunagagw\n tou\s u(poloi/pous tw=n *subaritw=n e)c
                    a)rxh=s w)/|kise th\n *su/barin, keime/nhn a)na\ me/son potamw=n duoi=n, tou= te
                    *suba/rios kai\ *kra/qios. a)gaqh\n d'
                    e)/xontes xw/ran taxu\ tai=s ou)si/ais prosane/bhsan. katasxo/ntes de\ th\n
                    po/lin e)/th o)li/ga pa/lin e)ce/peson e)k th=s *suba/rews: peri\ w(=n ta\ kata\
                    me/ros a)nagra/yai peiraso/meqa kata\ th\n e)xome/nhn bi/blon.
                    e)p' a)/rxontos d' *)aqh/nhsin *)antido/tou *(rwmai=oi
                    kate/sthsan u(pa/tous *leu/kion *postou/mion kai\ *ma/rkon *(ora/tion. e)pi\ de\
                    tou/twn *douke/tios  o( tw=n *sikelw=n e)/xwn th\n
                    h(gemoni/an *ai)/tnhn me\n katela/beto, to\n h(gou/menon au)th=s dolofonh/sas,
                    ei)s de\ th\n *)akraganti/nwn xw/ran a)nazeu/cas meta\ duna/mews *mo/tuon
                    frourou/menon u(po\ tw=n *)akraganti/nwn e)polio/rkhse: tw=n de\ *)akraganti/nwn
                    kai\ *surakosi/wn e)pibohqhsa/ntwn, suna/yas ma/xhn kai\ proterh/sas e)ch/lasen
                    a)mfote/rous e)k tw=n stratope/dwn. kai\ to/te
                    me\n tou= xeimw=nos e)nistame/nou diexwri/sqhsan ei)s th\n oi)kei/an, oi( de\
                    *surako/sioi to\n strathgo\n *bo/lkwna, th=s h(/tths ai)/tion o)/nta kai\
                    do/canta la/qra| sumpra/ttein tw=| *douketi/w|, katadika/santes w(s prodo/thn
                    a)pe/kteinan. tou= qe/rous de\ a)rxome/nou strathgo\n e(/teron kate/sthsan, w(=|
                    du/namin a)cio/logon do/ntes prose/tacan katapolemh=sai *douke/tion. ou(=tos de\ poreuqei\s meta\ th=s duna/mews kate/labe
                    to\n *douke/tion stratopedeu/onta peri\ ta\s *noma/s: genome/nhs de\ parata/cews
                    mega/lhs, kai\ pollw=n par' a)mfote/rois pipto/ntwn, mo/gis *surako/sioi
                    biasa/menoi tou\s *sikelou\s e)tre/yanto, kai\ kata\ th\n fugh\n pollou\s
                    a)nei=lon. tw=n de\ diafugo/ntwn oi( plei/ous me\n ei)s ta\ frou/ria tw=n
                    *sikelw=n diesw/qhsan, o)li/goi de\ meta\ *douketi/ou tw=n au)tw=n e)lpi/dwn
                    mete/xein proei/lonto. a(/ma de\ tou/tois
                    prattome/nois *)akraganti=noi to\ *mo/tuon frou/rion katexo/menon u(po\ tw=n
                    meta\ *douketi/ou *sikelw=n e)cepolio/rkhsan, kai\ th\n du/namin a)pagago/ntes
                    pro\s tou\s *surakosi/ous nenikhko/tas h)/dh koinh=| katestratope/deusan.
                    *douke/tios de\ dia\ th\n h(=ttan toi=s o(/lois suntribei/s, kai\ tw=n
                    stratiwtw=n au)to\n tw=n me\n kataleipo/ntwn, tw=n d' e)pibouleuo/ntwn, ei)s
                    th\n e)sxa/thn h)=lqen a)po/gnwsin. te/los de\ qewrw=n
                    tou\s u(poloi/pous fi/lous me/llontas au)tw=| ta\s xei=ras prosfe/rein, fqa/sas
                    au)tou\s kai\ nukto\s diadra\s a)fi/ppeusen ei)s ta\s *surakou/sas. e)/ti de\
                    nukto\s ou)/shs parh=lqen ei)s th\n a)gora\n tw=n *surakosi/wn, kai\ kaqi/sas
                    e)pi\ tw=n bwmw=n i(ke/ths e)ge/neto th=s po/lews, kai\ e(auto/n te kai\ th\n
                    xw/ran h(=s h)=n ku/rios pare/dwke toi=s *surakosi/ois. tou= de\ plh/qous dia\ to\ para/docon surre/ontos ei)s th\n
                    a)gora/n, oi( me\n a)/rxontes sunh/gagon e)kklhsi/an kai\ proe/qhkan boulh\n
                    peri\ tou= *douketi/ou ti/ xrh\ pra/ttein. e)/nioi me\n ou)=n tw=n dhmhgorei=n ei)wqo/twn sunebou/leuon kola/zein w(s
                    pole/mion kai\ peri\ tw=n h(marthme/nwn th\n prosh/kousan e)piqei=nai timwri/an:
                    oi( de\ xarie/statoi tw=n presbute/rwn pario/ntes a)pefai/nonto sw/zein to\n
                    i(ke/thn, kai\ th\n tu/xhn kai\ th\n ne/mesin tw=n qew=n e)ntre/pesqai: dei=n
                    ga\r skopei=n ou) ti/ paqei=n a)/cio/s e)sti *douke/tios, a)lla\ ti/ pre/pei
                    pra=cai *surakosi/ois: a)poktei=nai ga\r to\n peptwko/ta th=| tu/xh| mh\
                    prosh=kon, sw/zein d' a(/ma th\n pro\s tou\s qeou\s eu)se/beian kai\ to\n
                    i(ke/thn a)/cion ei)=nai th=s tou= dh/mou megaloyuxi/as. o( de\ dh=mos w(/sper tini\ mia=| fwnh=| sw/zein pa/ntoqen
                    e)bo/a to\n i(ke/thn. *surako/sioi me\n ou)=n a)polu/santes th=s timwri/as to\n
                    *douke/tion e)ce/pemyan ei)s th\n *ko/rinqon, kai\ e)ntau=qa prosta/cantes
                    katabiou=n th\n i(kanh\n au)tw=| xorhgi/an sunape/steilan. h(mei=s de\ paro/ntes e)pi\
                    to\n prohgou/menon e)niauto\n th=s *)aqhnai/wn stratei/as e)pi\ *ku/pron
                    *ki/mwnos h(goume/nou, kata\ th\n e)n a)rxh=| pro/qesin au)tou= perigra/fomen
                    th/nde th\n bi/blon.

head:
ta/de e)/nestin e)n th=| dwdeka/th| tw=n *diodw/rou
                bi/blwn.

p:
peri\ th=s *)aqhnai/wn

peri\ th=s

stratei/a *)aqhnai/wn

stratei/a

stratei/a *sita/lkou me\n ei)s *makedoni/an,
                    *lakedaimoni/wn de\ ei)s th\n *)attikh/n.

peri\ tou= genome/nou pole/mou *leonti/nois pro\s *surakousi/ous.

a)po/stasis *lesbi/wn a)po\ *)aqhnai/wn kai\ *plataiw=n

buzanti/wn kai\ *kalxhdoni/wn
                    stratei/a ei)s th\n *biquni/an.

peri\ tw=n
                    ai)tiw=n di' a(\s e)pi\ *surakou/sas e)stra/teusan *)aqhnai=oi.

l.#text:
me/trw| u(/dwr pi/nontes, a)metri\ de\ ma=zan
                        e)/dontes,
o(/stis d' o(milw=n h(/detai kakoi=s a)nh/r,

l: ou)pw/pot' h)rw/thsa, ginw/skwn o(/ti
toiou=to/s e)stin oi(=sper h(/detai cunw/n:
nomoqesi/a| ta/ t' a)/lla kai\ tauti\ le/gein:
o( paisi\n au(tou= mhtruia\n e)peisa/gwn
mh/t' eu)dokimei/tw mh/te metexe/tw lo/gou
para\ toi=s poli/tais, w(s e)pei/sakton kako\n
kata\ tw=n e(autou= pragma/twn peporisme/nos.
ei)/t' e)pe/tuxes ga/r, fhsi/, gh/mas to\ pro/teron,
eu)hmerw=n kata/pauson, ei)/t' ou)k e)pe/tuxes,
maniko\n to\ pei=ran deute/ras labei=n pa/lin.
a)ll' ei) pe/pleuke di/s,

l.#text: w)= lipernh=tes gewrgoi/, ta)ma/ tis cunie/tw

l: r(h/mat', ei) bou/lesq' a)kou=sai th/nd' o(/pws a)pw/leto.
prw=ta me\n ga\r au)th=s h)=rxe *feidi/as pra/cas kakw=s,
ei)=ta *perikle/hs fobhqei\s mh\ meta/sxh| th=s tu/xhs,
e)mbalw\n spinqh=ra mikro\n *megarikou= yhfi/smatos
e)cefu/shsen tosou=ton po/lemon w(/ste tw=| kapnw=|
pa/ntas *(/ellhnas dakru=sai, tou/s t' e)kei= tou/s t' e)nqa/de:
h)/strapten, e)bro/nta, suneku/ka th\n *(ella/da.
ou(/tws e)kh/lei kai\ mo/nos tw=n r(hto/rwn
to\ ke/ntron e)gkate/leipe toi=s a)krowme/nois.

p.#text:
dikai/ws a)/n tis a)porh/seie to\n nou=n e)pisth/sas
                    th=| kata\ to\n a)nqrw/pinon bi/on a)nwmali/a|: ou)/te ga\r tw=n nomizome/nwn
                    a)gaqw=n ou)de\n o(lo/klhron eu(ri/sketai dedome/non toi=s a)nqrw/pois ou)/te
                    tw=n kakw=n au)totele\s a)/neu tino\s eu)xrhsti/as. tou/tou de\ ta\s
                    a)podei/ceis e)ce/stai lamba/nein e)pisth/santas th\n dia/noian tai=s
                    progegenhme/nais pra/cesi, kai\ ma/lista tai=s megi/stais. h( ga\r *ce/rcou tou= *persw=n basile/ws e)pi\ th\n
                    *(ella/da stratei/a dia\ to\ me/geqos tw=n duna/mewn to\n me/giston e)pe/sthse
                    fo/bon toi=s *(/ellhsin, w(s a)\n u(pe\r a)ndrapodismou= mello/ntwn polemei=n,
                    kai\ prokatadedoulwme/nwn tw=n kata\ th\n *)asi/an *(ellhni/dwn po/lewn pa/ntes
                    u(pe/labon kai\ ta\s kata\ th\n *(ella/da th=s o(moi/as tu/xhs peira/sesqai.
                        tou= de\ pole/mou para\ th\n prosdoki/an
                    to\ te/los labo/ntos para/docon, ou) mo/non tw=n kindu/nwn a)pelu/qhsan oi( th\n
                    *(ella/da katoikou=ntes, a)lla\ kai\ do/can mega/lhn katekth/santo, kai\
                    tosau/ths eu)pori/as e)plhrw/qh pa=sa po/lis *(ellhni/s, w(/ste pa/ntas
                    qauma/sai th\n ei)s tou)nanti/on metabolh/n. a)po\ tou/twn ga\r tw=n xro/nwn e)pi\ e)/th penth/konta pollh\n e)pi/dosin
                    e)/laben h( *(ella\s pro\s th\n eu)daimoni/an. e)n tou/tois ga\r toi=s xro/nois
                    ai(/ te te/xnai dia\ th\n eu)pori/an hu)ch/qhsan, kai\ to/te me/gistoi
                    mnhmoneu/ontai texni=tai gegone/nai, w(=n e)sti *feidi/as o( a)galmatopoio/s:
                    o(moi/ws de\ kai\ ta\ kata\ th\n paidei/an e)pi\ polu\ proe/bh, kai\ filosofi/a
                    proetimh/qh kai\ r(htorikh\ para\ pa=si me\n *(/ellhsi, ma/lista de\
                    *)aqhnai/ois. filo/sofoi me\n ga\r oi( peri\
                    to\n *swkra/th kai\ *pla/twna kai\ *)aristote/lhn, r(h/tores de\ *periklh=s kai\
                    *)isokra/ths kai\ oi( tou/tou maqhtai/: o(moi/ws de\ kai\ a)/ndres e)pi\
                    strathgi/a| diabebohme/noi, *miltia/dhs, *qemistoklh=s, *)aristei/dhs, *ki/mwn,
                    *murwni/dhs kai\ e(/teroi plei/ones, peri\ w(=n makro\n a)\n ei)/h gra/fein.
                        ma/lista
                    de\ *)aqhnai=oi th=| te do/ch| kai\ a)ndrei/a| proko/yantes diwnoma/sqhsan kaq'
                    o(/lhn sxedo\n th\n oi)koume/nhn: e)pi\ tosou=to ga\r th\n h(gemoni/an
                    hu)/chsan, w(/ste a)/neu *lakedaimoni/wn kai\ *peloponnhsi/wn i)di/a| mega/las
                    duna/meis *persika\s kai\ kata\ gh=n kai\ kata\ qa/lattan kathgwni/santo, kai\
                    th\n peribo/hton *persw=n h(gemoni/an e)pi\ tosou=ton e)tapei/nwsan, w(/ste
                    a)nagka/sai pa/sas ta\s kata\ th\n *)asi/an po/leis e)leuqerw=sai kata\
                    sunqh/kas. a)lla\ peri\ me\n tou/twn
                    a)kribe/steron ta\ kata\ me/ros a)negra/yamen e)n dusi\ bi/blois, tau/th| te
                    kai\ th=| pro\ tau/ths: nuni\ de\ e)pi\ ta\s prokeime/nas pra/ceis treyo/meqa,
                    prodiori/santes tou\s oi)kei/ous th=| grafh=| xro/nous. e)n me\n ou)=n th=| pro\ tau/ths bi/blw| th\n a)rxh\n a)po\
                    th=s *ce/rcou stratei/as poihsa/menoi dih/lqomen ta\s koina\s pra/ceis e)pi\
                    to\n prohgou/menon e)niauto\n th=s *)aqhnai/wn stratei/as e)pi\ *ku/pron
                    *ki/mwnos h(goume/nou: e)n tau/th| de\ a)po\ th=s *)aqhnai/wn stratei/as e)pi\
                    *ku/pron poihsa/menoi die/cimen e(/ws e)pi\ to\n yhfisqe/nta po/lemon u(po\
                    *)aqhnai/wn pro\s *surakosi/ous. e)p' a)/rxontos ga\r
                    *)aqh/nhsin *eu)qudh/mou *(rwmai=oi me\n u(pa/tous kate/sthsan *leu/kion
                    *koi/+ntion *kikinna=ton kai\ *ma/rkon *fa/bion *ou)iboulano/n. e)pi\ de\
                    tou/twn *)aqhnai=oi diapepolemhko/tes u(pe\r *ai)gupti/wn pro\s *pe/rsas, kai\
                    ta\s nau=s a(pa/sas a)polwleko/tes e)n th=| legome/nh| *proswpi/tidi nh/sw|,
                    braxu\n xro/non dialipo/ntes e)/gnwsan pa/lin polemei=n toi=s *pe/rsais u(pe\r
                    tw=n kata\ th\n *)asi/an *(ellh/nwn. katarti/santes de\ sto/lon trih/rwn
                    diakosi/wn, kai\ strathgo\n e(lo/menoi *ki/mwna to\n *miltia/dou, prose/tacan
                    plei=n e)pi\ *ku/pron kai\ diapolemei=n toi=s *pe/rsais. o( de\ *ki/mwn a)nalabw\n to\n sto/lon kekosmhme/non
                    a)ndrw=n te a)retai=s kai\ xorhgi/ais dayile/sin e)/pleusen ei)s th\n *ku/pron.
                    kat' e)kei/nous de\ tou\s kairou\s tw=n *persikw=n duna/mewn e)strath/goun
                    *)arta/bazos kai\ *mega/buzos. *)arta/bazos me\n th\n h(gemoni/an e)/xwn e)n
                    th=| *ku/prw| die/triben, e)/xwn trih/reis triakosi/as, *mega/buzos de\ peri\
                    th\n *kiliki/an e)stratope/deue, peza\s e)/xwn duna/meis, w(=n o( a)riqmo\s h)=n
                    tria/konta muria/dwn. o( de\ *ki/mwn
                    katapleu/sas ei)s th\n *ku/pron kai\ qalattokratw=n *ki/tion me\n kai\ *ma/rion
                    e)cepolio/rkhse, kai\ toi=s krathqei=si filanqrw/pws proshne/xqh. meta\ de\
                    tau=ta e)k *kiliki/as kai\ *foini/khs prosferome/nwn trih/rwn th=| nh/sw|,
                    *ki/mwn e)panaxqei\s kai\ po/lemon sugkrou/sas polla\s me\n tw=n new=n
                    kate/dusen, e(kato\n de\ su\n au)toi=s toi=s a)ndra/sin ei(=le, ta\s de\ loipa\s
                    me/xri th=s *foini/khs katedi/wcen. oi( me\n
                    ou)=n *pe/rsai tai=s u(poleifqei/sais nausi\ kate/fugon ei)s th\n gh=n, kaq'
                    o(\n to/pon h)=n *mega/buzos e)stratopedeukw\s meta\ th=s pezh=s duna/mews: oi(
                    de\ *)aqhnai=oi prospleu/santes kai\ tou\s stratiw/tas e)kbiba/santes sunh=yan
                    ma/xhn, kaq' h(\n *)anacikra/ths me\n o( e(/teros tw=n strathgw=n lamprw=s
                    a)gwnisa/menos h(rwikw=s kate/streye to\n bi/on, oi( de\ a)/lloi krath/santes
                    th=| ma/xh| kai\ pollou\s a)nelo/ntes e)panh=lqon ei)s ta\s nau=s. meta\ de\
                    tau=ta *)aqhnai=oi pa/lin a)pe/pleusan ei)s th\n *ku/pron. tau=ta me\n ou)=n
                    e)pra/xqh kata\ to\ prw=ton e)/tos tou= pole/mou. e)p' a)/rxontos d' *)aqh/nhsi *pedie/ws *(rwmai=oi me\n
                    kate/sthsan u(pa/tous *ma/rkon *ou)ale/rion *laktou=kan kai\ *spo/rion
                    *ou)ergi/nion *tri/koston. e)pi\ de\ tou/twn *ki/mwn o( tw=n *)aqhnai/wn
                    strathgo\s qalattokratw=n e)xeirou=to ta\s kata\ th\n *ku/pron po/leis. e)n de\
                    th=| *salami=ni *persikh=s froura=s ou)/shs a)ciolo/gou, kai\ belw=n kai\
                    o(/plwn pantodapw=n, e)/ti de\ si/tou kai\ th=s a)/llhs paraskeuh=s gemou/shs
                    th=s po/lews, e)/krine sumfe/rein tau/thn e)kpoliorkh=sai. ou(/tw ga\r u(pela/mbane ma/lista th=s te *ku/prou pa/shs
                    r(a|di/ws kurieu/sein kai\ tou\s *pe/rsas kataplh/cesqai, bohqei=n me\n toi=s
                    *salamini/ois mh\ duname/nous dia\ to\ qalattokratei=n tou\s *)aqhnai/ous,
                    e)gkatalipo/ntas de\ tou\s summa/xous katafronhqh/sesqai, kaqo/lou de\ to\n
                    o(/lon po/lemon kriqh/sesqai th=s *ku/prou pa/shs bi/a| xeirwqei/shs: o(/per
                    kai\ sune/bh gene/sqai. oi( me\n ga\r
                    *)aqhnai=oi susthsa/menoi poliorki/an pro\s th=| *salami=ni kaq' h(me/ran
                    prosbola\s e)poiou=nto, oi( d' e)n th=| po/lei stratiw=tai, e)/xontes be/lh kai\
                    paraskeuh/n, r(a|di/ws a)po\ tw=n teixw=n h)mu/nonto tou\s poliorkou=ntas.
                        *)artace/rchs de\ o( basileu\s puqo/menos
                    ta\ peri\ th\n *ku/pron e)lattw/mata, kai\ bouleusa/menos meta\ tw=n fi/lwn
                    peri\ tou= pole/mou, e)/krine sumfe/rein ei)rh/nhn sunqe/sqai pro\s tou\s
                    *(/ellhnas. e)/graye toi/nun toi=s peri\ *ku/pron h(gemo/si kai\ satra/pais,
                    e)f' oi(=s a)\n du/nwntai sullu/sasqai pro\s tou\s *(/ellhnas. dio/per oi( peri\ to\n *)arta/bazon kai\ *mega/buzon
                    e)/pemyan ei)s ta\s *)aqh/nas presbeuta\s tou\s dialecome/nous peri\ sullu/sews.
                    u(pakousa/ntwn de\ tw=n *)aqhnai/wn kai\ pemya/ntwn pre/sbeis au)tokra/toras,
                    w(=n h(gei=to *kalli/as o( *(ipponi/kou, e)ge/nonto sunqh=kai peri\ th=s
                    ei)rh/nhs toi=s *)aqhnai/ois kai\ toi=s summa/xois pro\s tou\s *pe/rsas, w(=n
                    e)sti ta\ kefa/laia tau=ta: au)tono/mous ei)=nai ta\s kata\ th\n *)asi/an
                    *(ellhni/das po/leis a(pa/sas, tou\s de\ tw=n *persw=n satra/pas mh\
                    katabai/nein e)pi\ qa/lattan katwte/rw triw=n h(merw=n o(do/n, mhde\ nau=n
                    makra\n plei=n e)nto\s *fash/lidos kai\ *kuane/wn: tau=ta de\ tou= basile/ws
                    kai\ tw=n strathgw=n e)pitelou/ntwn, mh\ strateu/ein *)aqhnai/ous ei)s th\n
                    xw/ran, h(=s basileu\s a)/rxei. suntelesqeisw=n
                    de\ tw=n spondw=n *)aqhnai=oi ta\s duna/meis a)ph/gagon e)k th=s *ku/prou,
                    lampra\n me\n ni/khn nenikhko/tes, e)pifanesta/tas de\ sunqh/kas pepoihme/noi.
                    sune/bh de\ kai\ to\n *ki/mwna peri\ th\n *ku/pron diatri/bonta no/sw|
                    teleuth=sai. e)p' a)/rxontos de\ *)aqh/nhsi *fili/skou
                    *(rwmai=oi kate/sthsan u(pa/tous *ti/ton *(rwmi/lion *ou)atikano\n kai\ *ga/ion
                    *ou)etou/rion *kixw/rion, *)hlei=oi de\ h)/gagon *)olumpia/da tri/thn pro\s
                    tai=s o)gdoh/konta, kaq' h(\n e)ni/ka sta/dion *kri/swn *(imerai=os. e)pi\ de\ tou/twn *megarei=s me\n a)pe/sthsan a)po\
                    *)aqhnai/wn, kai\ pro\s *lakedaimoni/ous diapresbeusa/menoi summaxi/an
                    e)poi/hsan: oi( de\ *)aqhnai=oi parocunqe/ntes e)ce/pemyan stratiw/tas ei)s th\n
                    tw=n *megare/wn xw/ran, kai\ ta\s kth/seis diarpa/santes pollh=s w)felei/as
                    ku/rioi kate/sthsan. tw=n d' e)k th=s po/lews bohqou/ntwn th=| xw/ra| sune/sth
                    ma/xh, kaq' h(\n oi( *)aqhnai=oi nikh/santes sunedi/wcan tou\s *megarei=s
                    e)nto\s tw=n teixw=n. e)p' a)/rxontos d' *)aqh/nhsi
                    *timarxi/dou *(rwmai=oi me\n u(pa/tous kate/sthsan *spo/rion *tarph/ion kai\
                    *au)=lon *)aste/rion *fonti/nion. e)pi\ de\ tou/twn *lakedaimo/nioi me\n ei)s
                    th\n *)attikh\n e)mbalo/ntes e)po/rqhsan pollh\n xw/ran, kai\ tw=n frouri/wn
                    tina\ poliorkh/santes e)panh=lqon ei)s th\n *pelopo/nnhson, *tolmi/dhs de\ o(
                    tw=n *)aqhnai/wn strathgo\s ei(=le *xairw/neian. tw=n de\ *boiwtw=n sustrafe/ntwn kai\ toi=s peri\ to\n *tolmi/dhn
                    e)nedreusa/ntwn, e)ge/neto ma/xh kartera\ peri\ th\n *korw/neian, kaq' h(\n
                    *tolmi/dhs me\n maxo/menos a)nh|re/qh, tw=n de\ a)/llwn *)aqhnai/wn oi( me\n
                    kateko/phsan, oi( de\ zw=ntes e)lh/fqhsan. thlikau/ths de\ sumfora=s genome/nhs
                    toi=s *)aqhnai/ois, h)nagka/sqhsan a)fei=nai ta\s po/leis a(pa/sas ta\s kata\

                    *sikeli/an, *niki/as me\n o( *nikhra/tou, qaumazo/menos e)p' a)reth=| para\
                    toi=s poli/tais, sunebou/leue mh\ strateu/ein e)pi\ *sikeli/an: mh\ ga\r dunato\n u(pa/rxein a(/ma te *lakedaimoni/ois
                    diapolemei=n kai\ duna/meis mega/las e)kpe/mpein diaponti/ous, kai\ tw=n
                    *(ellh/nwn mh\ duname/nous kth/sasqai th\n h(gemoni/an e)lpi/zein th\n megi/sthn
                    tw=n kata\ th\n oi)koume/nhn nh/swn peripoih/sasqai, kai\ *karxhdoni/ous me/n,
                    e)/xontas megi/sthn h(gemoni/an kai\ polla/kis u(pe\r th=s *sikeli/as
                    pepolemhko/tas, mh\ dedunh=sqai krath=sai th=s nh/sou, tou\s de\ *)aqhnai/ous,
                    polu\ leipome/nous th=| duna/mei tw=n *karxhdoni/wn, dori/kthton poih/sasqai
                    th\n krati/sthn tw=n nh/swn. polla\ de\ kai\ a)/lla dialexqe/ntos au)tou= th=s
                    prokeime/nhs u(poqe/sews oi)kei=a, th=s e)nanti/as gnw/mhs proesthkw\s
                    *)alkibia/dhs, e)pifane/statos *)aqhnai/wn, e)/peise to\n dh=mon e)panele/sqai
                    to\n po/lemon: h)=n ga\r o( a)nh\r ou(=tos deino/tatos me\n ei)pei=n tw=n
                    politw=n, eu)genei/a| de\ kai\ plou/tw| kai\ strathgi/a| diwnomasme/nos.
                        eu)qu\s ou)=n o( dh=mos sto/lon a)cio/xrewn
                    kateskeu/ase, tria/konta me\n trih/reis para\ tw=n summa/xwn labw/n, i)di/as d'
                    e(kato\n katarti/sas. tau/tas de\ kosmh/sas
                    pa=si toi=s ei)s po/lemon xrhsi/mois kate/lecen o(pli/tas ei)s pentakisxili/ous,
                    strathgou\s de\ trei=s e)xeiroto/nhsen e)pi\ tau/thn th\n strathgi/an,
                    *)alkibia/dhn kai\ *niki/an kai\ *la/maxon. *)aqhnai=oi me\n ou)=n peri\ tau=ta h)=san.
                    h(mei=s de\ paro/ntes e)pi\ th\n a)rxh\n tou= pole/mou tou= susta/ntos
                    *)aqhnai/ois kai\ *surakosi/ois, kata\ th\n e)n a)rxh=| pro/qesin ta\s
                    e(pome/nas pra/ceis ei)s th\n e)xome/nhn bi/blon katata/comen.

head:
ta/d' e)/nestin e)n th=| triskaideka/th| tw=n *diodw/rou
                bu/blwn.

p:

                    *surakosi/ous mega/lais duna/mesi pezikai=s te kai\ nautikai=s.
kata/plous *)aqhnai/wn ei)s *sikeli/an.

w(s *)aqhnai=oi diapleu/santes

                    *)olu/mpion to/pous.

w(s

ma/xh *surakosi/wn kai\
                    *)aqhnai/wn kai\ ni/kh *)aqhnai/wn mega/lh.

ma/xh
                    toi=s au)toi=s kai\ ni/kh *surakosi/wn.

w(s nautikh\n du/namin oi( *surako/sioi kataskeua/santes

dia/lusis spondw=n u(po\

naumaxi/a *surakosi/wn kai\

naumaxi/a pa/sais tai=s
                        nausi\n e)n tw=| mega/lw| lime/ni kai\ ni/kh *surakosi/wn.

kata/plous e)c *)aqhnw=n *dhmosqe/nous kai\ *eu)rume/dontos

ma/xh mega/lh peri\

drasmo\s
