w(s *surako/sioi sunelqo/ntes ei)s e)kklhsi/an proe/qhkan
                    boulh/n, pw=s xrhste/on toi=s ai)xmalw/tois.

oi(
                        r(hqe/ntes lo/goi pro\s e(ka/teron me/ros th=s u(poqe/sews.

ta\ yhfisqe/nta toi=s *surakosi/ois peri\ tw=n
                        ai)xmalw/twn.

w(s *)aqhnai/wn ptaisa/ntwn
                            peri\ *sikeli/an polloi\ tw=n summa/xwn a)pe/sthsan.

w(s o( dh=mos tw=n *)aqhnai/wn a)qumh/sas parexw/rhse th=s
                                dhmokrati/as kai\ tetrakosi/ois a)ndra/si th\n politei/an e)pe/treyan.

w(s *lakedaimo/nioi tai=s naumaxi/ais tou\s *)aqhnai/ous
                        e)ni/khsan.

w(s *surako/sioi tou\s
                    a)ndragaqh/santas kata\ to\n po/lemon a)ciolo/gois dwreai=s
                        e)ti/mhsan.

w(s *dioklh=s nomoqe/ths
                            ai(reqei\s e)/graye tou\s no/mous *surakosi/ois.

w(s *surako/sioi toi=s *lakedaimoni/ois du/namin a)cio/logon
                        e)/pemyan.

w(s *)aqhnai=oi to\n tw=n
                    *lakedaimoni/wn nau/arxon katanaumaxh/santes *ku/zikon
                        e)cepolio/rkhsan.

w(s *lakedaimoni/wn e)c
                    *eu)boi/as penth/konta nau=s a)posteila/ntwn e)pi\ boh/qeian toi=s h(tthme/nois,
                    a(/pasai peri\ to\n *)/aqw meta\ tw=n a)ndrw=n diefqa/rhsan u(po\ tou=
                        xeimw=nos.

*)alkibia/dou ka/qodos kai\
                        strathgi/a.

po/lemos *ai)gestai/ois kai\
                            *selinounti/ois peri\ th=s a)mfisbhtoume/nhs xw/ras.

w(s *lakedaimo/nioi to\n
                                *eu)/ripon xw/santes th\n *eu)/boian h)/peiron e)poi/hsan.

peri\ th=s e)n *korku/ra| genome/nhs sta/sews kai\
                        sfagh=s.

naumaxi/a *)aqhnai/wn kai\ *lakedaimoni/wn peri\ to\ *si/geion
                    kai\ ni/kh *)aqhnai/wn.

w(s *)alkibia/dhs kai\ *qhrame/nhs
                    e)ni/khsan *lakedaimoni/ous a(/ma pezh=| kai\ kata\ qa/lattan
                        e)pifane/stata.

w(s *karxhdo/nioi mega/las
                    duna/meis diabiba/santes e)n *sikeli/a| *selinou=nta kai\ *(ime/ran kata\
                    kra/tos ei(=lon.

w(s ei)s to\n *peiraie/a
                    katapleu/sas meta\ pollw=n lafu/rwn mega/lhs e)/tuxen a)podoxh=s
                        *)alkibia/dhs.

w(s *)=agis o( basileu\s
                    mega/lh| duna/mei ta\s *)aqh/nas poliorkei=n e)pibalo/menos
                        e)ce/pesen.

*)alkibia/dou fugh/, kai\ kti/sis
                    *qe/rmwn e)n *sikeli/a|.

naumaxi/a *surakosi/wn
                        pro\s *karxhdoni/ous kai\ ni/kh *surakosi/wn.

peri\ th=s e)n *)akra/ganti eu)daimoni/as kai\ tw=n e)n au)th=|
                        kataskeuasma/twn.

w(s *karxhdo/nioi tria/konta
                            muria/si strateu/santes ei)s *sikeli/an e)polio/rkhsan *)akra/ganta.

w(s *surako/sioi paralabo/ntes tou\s summa/xous muri/ois
                                stratiw/tais e)boh/qoun toi=s *)akraganti/nois.

w(s tetrakismuri/wn *karxhdoni/wn a)panthsa/ntwn e)ni/khsan oi( *surako/sioi
                    kai\ plei/ous tw=n e(cakisxili/wn kate/koyan.

w(s
                    *karxhdoni/wn ta\s a)gora\s parairoume/nwn oi( *)akraganti=noi dia\ th\n spa/nin
                    th=s trofh=s h)nagka/sqhsan e)klipei=n th\n patri/da.

w(s *dionu/sios strathgo\s ai(reqei\s e)tura/nnhse tw=n
                        *surakosi/wn.

w(s *)aqhnai=oi e)n
                    *)arginou/sais e)pifanesta/th| naumaxi/a| nikh/santes tou\s strathgou\s a)di/kws
                        e)qana/twsan.

w(s *)aqhnai=oi mega/lh|
                    naumaxi/a| leifqe/ntes h)nagka/sqhsan e)f' oi(=s dunato\n h)=n sunqe/sqai th\n
                    ei)rh/nhn, kai\ ou(/tws o( *peloponnhsiako\s po/lemos katelu/qh.

w(s *karxhdo/nioi loimikh=| no/sw| peripeso/ntes
                    h)nagka/sqhsan sunqe/sqai th\n ei)rh/nhn pro\s *dionu/sion to\n tu/rannon.

l.#text: oi(/d' a)po\ penth/konta new=n qa/naton profugo/ntes

l: pro\s skope/loisin *)/aqw sw/mata gh=| pe/lasan
dw/deka, tou\s d' a)/llous o)/lesen me/ga lai=tma qala/sshs,
nh=a/s te stugeroi=s pneu/masi xrhsame/nas.

p.#text:
ei) me\n o(/moia toi=s a)/llois i(stori/an
                    e)pragmateuo/meqa, sxedo\n h)=n e)n tw=| prooimi/w| peri/ tinwn dialexqe/ntas
                    e)f' o(/son h)=n eu)/kairon, ou(/tws e)pi\ ta\s sunexei=s pra/ceis metabiba/zein
                    to\n lo/gon: o)li/gon ga\r xro/non a)polabo/ntes th=| grafh=|, th\n a)nastrofh\n
                    a)\n ei)/xomen to\n a)po\ tw=n prooimi/wn karpo\n proslamba/nesqai: e)pei\ de\ e)n o)li/gais bi/blois e)phggeila/meqa mh\
                    mo/non ta\s pra/ceis e)f' o(/son a)\n dunw/meqa gra/yein, a)lla\ kai\
                    perilh/yesqai xro/non plei/ona tw=n xili/wn kai\ e(kato\n e)tw=n, a)nagkai=o/n
                    e)sti to\n polu\n lo/gon tw=n prooimi/wn parape/myantas e)p' au)ta\s e)/rxesqai
                    ta\s pra/ceis, tou=to mo/non proeipo/ntas, o(/ti kata\ me\n ta\s prohgoume/nas
                    e(\c bi/blous a)negra/yamen ta\s a)po\ tw=n *trwikw=n pra/ceis e(/ws ei)s to\n
                    u(po\ tw=n *)aqhnai/wn yhfisqe/nta po/lemon e)pi\ *surakosi/ous, ei)s o(\n a)po\
                    *troi/as a(lw/sews e)sti\n e)/th e(ptako/sia e(ch/konta o)ktw/: e)n tau/th| de\ prosanaplhrou=ntes to\n sunexh= xro/non,
                    a)rco/meqa me\n a)po\ th=s e)pi\ *surakosi/ous stratei/as, katalh/comen d' e)pi\
                    th\n a)rxh\n tou= deute/rou pole/mou *karxhdoni/ois pro\s *dionu/sion to\n
                    *surakosi/wn tu/rannon. e)p' a)/rxontos ga\r
                    *)aqh/nhsi *xabri/ou *(rwmai=oi me\n a)nti\ tw=n u(pa/twn kate/sthsan
                    xilia/rxous trei=s, *leu/kion *se/rgion, *ma/rkon *papi/rion, *ma/rkon
                    *seroui/lion. e)pi\ de\ tou/twn *)aqhnai=oi yhfisa/menoi to\n pro\s
                    *surakosi/ous po/lemon ta/s te nau=s e)peskeu/asan kai\ xrh/mata sunagago/ntes
                    meta\ pollh=s spoudh=s a(/panta ta\ pro\s th\n stratei/an pareskeua/zonto.
                    h(|rhme/noi de\ trei=s strathgou/s, *)alkibia/dhn, *niki/an, *la/maxon,
                    au)tokra/toras au)tou\s kate/sthsan a(pa/ntwn tw=n kata\ to\n po/lemon.
                        tw=n de\ i)diwtw=n oi( tai=s ou)si/ais
                    eu)porou=ntes th=| proqumi/a| tou= dh/mou xari/zesqai boulo/menoi tine\s me\n
                    i)di/as trih/reis kateskeu/asan, tine\s de\ xrh/mata dw/sein ei)s ta\s trofa\s
                    th=s duna/mews e)phgge/llonto: polloi\ de\ kai\ tw=n dhmotikw=n politw=n kai\
                    ce/nwn, e)/ti de\ summa/xwn, e(kousi/ws prosio/ntes toi=s strathgoi=s
                    diekeleu/onto katagra/fein e(autou\s ei)s tou\s stratiw/tas. ou(/tws a(/pantes
                    memetewrisme/noi tai=s e)lpi/sin e)c e(toi/mou kataklhrouxei=n h)/lpizon th\n
                    *sikeli/an. h)/dh de\ tou= sto/lou
                    pareskeuasme/nou, tou\s e(rma=s tou\s kata\ th\n po/lin pamplhqei=s o)/ntas
                    sune/bh e)n mia=| nukti\ perikoph=nai. o( me\n ou)=n dh=mos, ou)x u(po\ tw=n
                    tuxo/ntwn nomi/sas gegenh=sqai th\n pra=cin, a)ll' u(po\ tw=n proexo/ntwn tai=s
                    do/cais e)pi\ th=| katalu/sei th=s dhmokrati/as, e)misoponh/rei kai\ tou\s
                    pra/cantas e)zh/tei mega/las dwrea\s proqei\s tw=| mhnu/santi. proselqw\n de/ tis th=| boulh=| tw=n i)diwtw=n e)/fhsen ei)s
                    oi)ki/an metoi/kou tina\s e(wrake/nai th=| noumhni/a| peri\ me/sas nu/ktas
                    ei)sio/ntas, e)n oi(=s kai\ to\n *)alkibia/dhn. a)nakrino/menos d' u(po\ th=s
                    boulh=s, pw=s nukto\s ou)/shs e)pegi/nwske ta\s o)/yeis, e)/fhse pro\s to\ th=s
                    selh/nhs fw=s e(wrake/nai. ou(=tos me\n ou)=n au(to\n e)cele/gcas kateyeusme/nos
                    h)pisth/qh, tw=n d' a)/llwn ou)d' i)/xnos ou)dei\s th=s pra/cews eu(rei=n
                    h)dunh/qh. trih/rwn me\n e(kato\n tessara/konta e(toimasme/nwn, o(lka/dwn de\ kai\ tw=n
                    i(ppagwgw=n, e)/ti de\ tw=n to\n si=ton kai\ th\n a)/llhn paraskeuh\n
                    komizo/ntwn polu/s tis a)riqmo\s h)=n: o(pli=tai de\ kai\ sfendonh=tai, pro\s
                    de\ tou/tois i(ppei=s kai\ tw=n summa/xwn plei/ous tw=n e(ptakisxili/wn e)kto\s
                    tw=n e)n toi=s plhrw/masi. to/te me\n ou)=n oi(
                    strathgoi\ meta\ th=s boulh=s e)n a)porrh/tw| sunedreu/ontes e)bouleu/onto, pw=s
                    xrh\ dioikh=sai ta\ kata\ th\n *sikeli/an, e)a\n th=s nh/sou krath/swsin.
                    e)/docen ou)=n au)toi=s *selinounti/ous me\n kai\ *surakosi/ous
                    a)ndrapodi/sasqai, toi=s d' a)/llois a(plw=s ta/cai fo/rous, ou(\s kat'
                    e)niauto\n oi)/sousin *)aqhnai/ois. th=| d' u(sterai/a| kate/bainon oi( strathgoi\ meta\
                    tw=n stratiwtw=n ei)s to\n *peiraie/a, kai\ sunhkolou/qei pa=s o( kata\ th\n
                    po/lin o)/xlos a)nami\c a)stw=n te kai\ ce/nwn, e(ka/stou tou\s i)di/ous
                    suggenei=s te kai\ fi/lous prope/mpontos. ai(
                    me\n ou)=n trih/reis par' o(/lon to\n lime/na parw/rmoun kekosmhme/nai toi=s
                    e)pi\ tai=s prw/|rais e)pish/masi kai\ th=| lampro/thti tw=n o(/plwn: o( de\
                    ku/klos a(/pas tou= lime/nos e)/geme qumiathri/wn kai\ krath/rwn a)rgurw=n, e)c
                    w(=n e)kpw/masi xrusoi=s e)/spendon oi( timw=ntes to\ qei=on kai\ proseuxo/menoi
                    katatuxei=n th=s stratei/as. a)naxqe/ntes ou)=n
                    e)k tou= *peiraie/ws perie/pleusan th\n *pelopo/nnhson kai\ kathne/xqhsan ei)s
                    *ko/rkuran: e)ntau=qa ga\r parame/nein parh/ggelto kai\ prosanalamba/nein tou\s
                    paroi/kous tw=n summa/xwn. e)pei\ d' a(/pantes h)qroi/sqhsan, diapleu/santes
                    to\n *)io/nion po/ron pro\s a)/kran *)iapugi/an kathne/xqhsan, ka)kei=qen h)/dh
                    parele/gonto th\n *)itali/an. u(po\ me\n ou)=n
                    *taranti/nwn ou) prosede/xqhsan, *metaponti/nous de\ kai\ *(hrakleiw/tas
                    pare/pleusan: ei)s de\ *qouri/ous katenexqe/ntes pa/ntwn e)/tuxon tw=n
                    filanqrw/pwn. e)kei=qen de\ katapleu/santes ei)s *kro/twna, kai\ labo/ntes
                    a)gora\n para\ tw=n *krotwniatw=n, th=s te *lakini/as *(/hras to\ i(ero\n
                    pare/pleusan kai\ th\n *dioskouria/da kaloume/nhn a)/kran u(pere/qento.
                        meta\ de\ tau=ta to\ kalou/meno/n te
                    *skullh/tion kai\ *lokrou\s parh/llacan, kai\ tou= *(rhgi/ou kaqormisqe/ntes
                    e)ggu\s e)/peiqon tou\s *(rhgi/nous summaxei=n: oi( de\ a)pekri/nanto
                    bouleu/sesqai meta\ tw=n a)/llwn *)italiwtw=n. *surako/sioi d' a)kou/santes e)pi\ tou= porqmou= ta\s duna/meis ei)=nai tw=n
                    *)aqhnai/wn, strathgou\s kate/sthsan au)tokra/toras trei=s, *(ermokra/thn,
                    *sikano/n, *(hraklei/dhn, oi(\ tou\s stratiw/tas kate/grafon kai\ pre/sbeis
                    e)pi\ ta\s kata\ *sikeli/an po/leis a)pe/stellon, deo/menoi th=s koinh=s
                    swthri/as a)ntilamba/nesqai: tou\s ga\r *)aqhnai/ous tw=| me\n lo/gw| pro\s
                    *surakosi/ous e)ni/stasqai to\n po/lemon, th=| d' a)lhqei/a| katastre/yasqai
                    boulome/nous o(/lhn th\n nh=son. *)akraganti=noi me\n ou)=n kai\ *na/cioi summaxh/sein e)/fhsan *)aqhnai/ois,
                    *kamarinai=oi de\ kai\ *messh/nioi th\n me\n ei)rh/nhn a)/cein w(molo/ghsan,
                    ta\s d' u(pe\r th=s summaxi/as a)pokri/seis a)neba/lonto: *(imerai=oi de\ kai\
                    *selinou/ntioi, pro\s de\ tou/tois *gelw=|oi kai\ *katanai=oi, sunagwniei=sqai
                    toi=s *surakosi/ois e)phggei/lanto. ai( de\ tw=n *sikelw=n po/leis th=| me\n
                    eu)noi/a| pro\s *surakosi/ous e)/rrepon, o(/mws d' e)n h(suxi/a| me/nousai to\
                    sumbhso/menon e)karado/koun. tw=n d'
                    *ai)gestai/wn ou)x o(mologou/ntwn dw/sein ple/on tw=n tria/konta tala/ntwn, oi(
                    strathgoi\ tw=n *)aqhnai/wn e)gkale/santes au)toi=s a)nh/xqhsan e)k *(rhgi/ou
                    meta\ th=s duna/mews, kai\ kate/pleusan th=s *sikeli/as ei)s *na/con. decame/nwn
                    d' au)tou\s tw=n e)n th=| po/lei filofro/nws, pare/pleusan e)kei=qen ei)s
                    *kata/nhn. tw=n de\ *katanai/wn ei)s me\n th\n
                    po/lin ou) dexome/nwn tou\s stratiw/tas, tou\s de\ strathgou\s e)asa/ntwn
                    ei)selqei=n kai\ parasxome/nwn e)kklhsi/an, oi( strathgoi\ tw=n *)aqhnai/wn
                    peri\ summaxi/as diele/gonto. dhmhgorou=ntos
                    de\ tou= *)alkibia/dou tw=n stratiwtw=n tines dielo/ntes puli/da pareise/peson
                    ei)s th\n po/lin: di' h(\n ai)ti/an h)nagka/sqhsan oi( *katanai=oi koinwnei=n
                    tou= kata\ tw=n *surakosi/wn pole/mou. tou/twn
                    de\ prattome/nwn oi( kata\ th\n i)di/an e)/xqran misou=ntes to\n *)alkibia/dhn

                    kai\ xrusi/on kai\ ta\ r(a|di/ws fe/resqai duna/mena suneskeua/zonto, tine\s de\

                    xrhma/twn poiou/menoi: e)/nioi de\ geghrako/tes h)\ no/sw| baruno/menoi di'
                    e)rhmi/an suggenw=n h)\ fi/lwn u(pelei/ponto, prosdokwme/nwn o(/son ou)/pw
                    pare/sesqai tw=n *karxhdoni/wn: h( ga\r peri\
                    *selinou=nta kai\ *(ime/ran, e)/ti de\ *)akra/ganta, genome/nh sumfora\ tou\s
                    a)nqrw/pous e)ce/plhtte, pa/ntwn kaqa/per u(po\ th\n o(/rasin lambano/ntwn th\n
                    tw=n *karxhdoni/wn deino/thta. ou)demi/a ga\r h)=n par' au)toi=s feidw\ tw=n
                    a(liskome/nwn, a)ll' a)sumpaqw=s tw=n h)tuxhko/twn ou(\s me\n a)nestau/roun,
                    oi(=s d' a)forh/tous e)ph=gon u(/breis. ou)
                    mh\n a)lla\ duei=n po/lewn e)corizome/nwn e)/gemen h( xw/ra gunaikw=n kai\
                    pai/dwn kai\ tw=n a)/llwn o)/xlwn: a(\ qewrou=ntes oi( stratiw=tai di' o)rgh=s
                    me\n ei)=xon to\n *dionu/sion, h)le/oun de\ ta\s tw=n a)klhrou/ntwn tu/xas:
                        e(w/rwn ga\r pai=das e)leuqe/rous kai\
                    parqe/nous e)piga/mous a)naci/ws th=s h(liki/as w(s e)/tuxe kata\ th\n o(do\n
                    w(rmhme/nas, e)peidh\ th\n semno/thta kai\ th\n pro\s tou\s a)llotri/ous
                    e)ntroph\n o( kairo\s a)fh|rei=to. paraplhsi/ws de\ kai\ toi=s presbute/rois
                    sunh/lgoun, ble/pontes para\ fu/sin a)nagkazome/nous a(/ma toi=s a)kma/zousin
                    e)pispeu/dein. e)f' oi(=s e)ceka/eto to\
                    kata\ tou= *dionusi/ou mi=sos: kai\ ga\r u(pela/mbanon au)to\n e)k sunqe/sews
                    tou=to pepoihke/nai pro\s to\ tw=| *karxhdoni/wn fo/bw| tw=n a)/llwn po/lewn
                    a)sfalw=s dunasteu/ein. a)nelogi/zonto ga\r
                    th\n braduth=ta th=s bohqei/as, to\ mhde/na peptwke/nai tw=n misqofo/rwn, to\
                    mhdeno\s a(drou= ptai/smatos gegenhme/nou fugei=n a)lo/gws, to\ de\ me/giston,
                    to\ mhde/na tw=n polemi/wn e)phkolouqhke/nai: w(/ste toi=s pro/teron
                    e)piqumou=si kairo\n labei=n th=s a)posta/sews kaqa/per qew=n pronoi/a| pa/nta
                    u(pourgei=n pro\s th\n kata/lusin th=s dunastei/as. oi( me\n ou)=n *)italiw=tai katalipo/ntes au)to\n e)p'
                    oi)/kou dia\ th=s mesogei/ou th\n porei/an e)poih/santo, oi( de\ tw=n
                    *surakosi/wn i(ppei=s to\ me\n prw=ton e)peth/roun, ei) du/nainto kata\ th\n
                    o(do\n a)nelei=n to\n tu/rannon: w(s de\ e(w/rwn ou)k a)polei/pontas au)to\n
                    tou\s misqofo/rous, o(moqumado\n a)fi/ppeusan ei)s ta\s *surakou/sas. katalabo/ntes de\ tou\s e)n toi=s newri/ois
                    a)gnoou=ntas ta\ peri\ th\n *ge/lan, ei)sh=lqon ou)deno\s kwlu/santos, kai\ th\n
                    me\n oi)ki/an tou= *dionusi/ou dih/rpasan ge/mousan a)rgu/rou te kai\ xrusou=
                    kai\ th=s a)/llhs polutelei/as a(pa/shs, th\n de\ gunai=ka sullabo/ntes ou(/tw
                    die/qesan kakw=s, w(/ste kai\ to\n tu/rannon bare/ws e)ne/xein th\n o)rgh/n,
                    nomi/zontes th\n tau/ths timwri/an megi/sthn ei)=nai pi/stin th=s pro\s
                    a)llh/lous koinwni/as kata\ th\n e)pi/qesin. o(
                    de\ *dionu/sios kata\ th\n o(doipori/an to\ gegono\s katastoxazo/menos,
                    e)pe/lece tw=n i(ppe/wn kai\ tw=n pezw=n tou\s pistota/tous, meq' w(=n
                    h)pei/geto pro\s th\n po/lin spoudh=s ou)de\n e)llei/pwn: e)logi/zeto ga\r ou)k
                    a)\n a)/llws dunato\n e)pikrath=sai tw=n i(ppe/wn, ei) mh\ speu/doi: o(/per
                    e)poi/hsen. ei) ga\r paradoco/teron e)kei/nwn poih/saito th\n a)/ficin, h)/lpize
                    r(a|di/ws krath/sein th=s e)pibolh=s: o(/per kai\ sune/pesen. oi( ga\r i(ppei=s ou)/t' a)\n e)/t' a)pelqei=n ou)/te
                    mei=nai kata\ to\ strato/pedon to\n *dionu/sion u(pela/mbanon: dio/per
                    kekrathke/nai th=s e)pibolh=s nomi/santes, e)/fasan au)to\n e)k me\n *ge/las
                    prospoihqh=nai tou\s *foi/nikas a)podidra/skein, nuni\ de\ w(s a)lhqw=s
                    a)podedrake/nai tou\s *surakosi/ous. *dionu/sios de\ dianu/sas stadi/ous peri\
                    tetrakosi/ous parh=n peri\ me/sas nu/ktas pro\s th\n pu/lhn th=s *)axradinh=s
                    meq' i(ppe/wn e(kato\n kai\ pezw=n e(cakosi/wn: h(\n katalabw\n kekleisme/nhn,
                    prose/qhken au)th=| to\n katakekomisme/non e)k tw=n e(lw=n ka/lamon, w(=|
                    xrh=sqai nomi/zousin oi( *surako/sioi pro\s th\n th=s koni/as su/ndesin. e)n
                    o(/sw| de\ sune/baine ta\s pu/las katakai/esqai, prosanela/mbane tou\s
                    a)fusterou=ntas. e)peidh\ de\ to\ pu=r
                    kate/fqeire ta\s pu/las, ou(=tos me\n meta\ tw=n h)kolouqhko/twn ei)sh/laune
                    dia\ th=s *)axradinh=s, tw=n d' i(ppe/wn oi( dunatw/tatoi to\ gegono\s
                    a)kou/santes, to\ me\n plh=qos ou)k a)ne/menon, eu)qu\s d' e)ceboh/qoun o)/ntes
                    o)li/goi pantelw=sh)=san de\ peri\ th\n a)gora/nkai\
                    kuklwqe/ntes u(po\ tw=n misqofo/rwn a(/pantes kathkonti/sqhsan. o( de\ *dionu/sios e)pelqw\n th\n po/lin tou/s te spora/dhn
                    e)kbohqou=ntas a)nei=le, kai\ tw=n a)llotri/ws diakeime/nwn e)ph/|ei ta\s
                    oi)ki/as, w(=n tou\s me\n a)pe/kteine, tou\s d' e)k th=s po/lews e)ce/bale. to\
                    de\ loipo\n plh=qos tw=n i(ppe/wn e)kpeso\n e)k th=s po/lews katela/beto th\n
                    nu=n kaloume/nhn *ai)/tnhn. a(/ma d' h(me/ra|
                    to\ me\n plh=qos tw=n misqofo/rwn kai\ to\ stra/teuma tw=n *sikeliwtw=n
                    kath/nthsen ei)s ta\s *surakou/sas, *gelw=|oi de\ kai\ *kamarinai=oi tw=|
                    *dionusi/w| diafo/rws e)/xontes ei)s *leonti/nous a)phlla/ghsan. dio/per u(po\ tw=n pragma/twn a)nagkazo/menos *)imi/lkas
                    e)/pemyen ei)s *surakou/sas kh/ruka, parakalw=n tou\s h(tthme/nous dialu/sasqai.
                    a)sme/nws d' u(pakou/santos tou= *dionusi/ou th\n ei)rh/nhn e)pi\ toi=sde
                    e)/qento: *karxhdoni/wn ei)=nai meta\ tw=n e)c a)rxh=s a)poi/kwn *)elu/mous kai\
                    *sikanou/s: *selinounti/ous de\ kai\ *)akraganti/nous, e)/ti d' *(imerai/ous,
                    pro\s de\ tou/tois *gelw/|ous kai\ *kamarinai/ous oi)kei=n me\n e)n
                    a)teixi/stois tai=s po/lesi, fo/ron de\ telei=n toi=s *karxhdoni/ois:
                    *leonti/nous de\ kai\ *messhni/ous kai\ *sikelou\s a(/pantas au)tono/mous
                    ei)=nai, kai\ *surakosi/ous me\n u(po\ *dionu/sion teta/xqai, ta\ de\
                    ai)xma/lwta kai\ ta\s nau=s a)podou=nai tou\s e)/xontas toi=s a)pobalou=si.
                        tw=n sunqhkw=n de\ genome/nwn *karxhdo/nioi
                    me\n ei)s *libu/hn e)ce/pleusan, plei=on h)\ to\ h(/misu me/ros tw=n stratiwtw=n
                    a)pobalo/ntes u(po\ th=s no/sou: ou)de\n d' h(=tton kai\ kata\ *libu/hn
                    diamei/nantos tou= loimou=, pamplhqei=s au)tw=n te tw=n *karxhdoni/wn, e)/ti de\
                    tw=n summa/xwn diefqa/rhsan. h(mei=s de\ paragenhqe/ntes e)pi\ th\n kata/lusin tw=n
                    pole/mwn, kata\ me\n th\n *(ella/da tou= *peloponnhsiakou=, kata\ de\ th\n
                    *sikeli/an tou= *karxhdoni/ois pro\s *dionu/sion prw/tou susta/ntos, h(gou/meqa
                    dei=n e)pitetelesme/nhs th=s proqe/sews ta\s e(ch=s pra/ceis ei)s th\n
                    e)xome/nhn bi/blon kataxwri/sai.

p:
*(rhgi/ou a(/lwsis kai\ ta\
                    peri\ th\n po/lin a)tuxh/mata.

(/alwsis *(rw/mhs
                        u(po\ *galatw=n plh\n tou= *kapetwli/ou.

p.#text:
pa/ntas me\n i)/sws ei)ko/s e)sti prosa/ntws a)kou/ein
                    ta\s kaq' e(autw=n blasfhmi/as: kai\ ga\r oi( kata\ pa=n e)/kdhlon e)/xontes
                    th\n e(autw=n kaki/an, w(/ste mhd' e)carnei=sqai, o(/mws yo/gou tugxa/nontes
                    diaganaktou=si kai\ lo/gous ei)sfe/rein peirw=ntai pro\s th\n kathgori/an.
                    dio/per eu)labhte/on e)k panto\s tro/pou to\ pra/ttein ti fau=lon pa=si,
                    ma/lista me/ntoi toi=s h(gemoni/as o)regome/nois h)/ tinos e)pish/mou tu/xhs
                    metalabou=sin: o( ga\r tou/twn bi/os peri/optos
                    w)\n dia\ th\n e)pifa/neian e)n pa=sin a)dunatei= kru/ptein th\n i)di/an
                    a)/gnoian: w(/ste mhdei\s e)lpize/tw tw=n tuxo/ntwn u(peroxh=s tinos, a)\n
                    e)camarta/nh| mega/la, lh/sesqai dia\ te/lous a)nepiti/mhtos. kai\ ga\r a)\n e)n
                    tw=| kaq' e(auto\n bi/w| diafu/gh| to\n a)po\ th=s e)pitimh/sews lo/gon,
                    u(/steron h(/cein e)p' au)to\n prosdexe/sqw th\n a)lh/qeian meta\ parrhsi/as
                    khru/ttousan ta\ pa/lai siwpw/mena. xalepo\n
                    ou)=n toi=s fau/lois tou= panto\s bi/ou kaqa/per a)qa/naton ei)ko/na meta\ th\n
                    i)di/an teleuth\n a)polei/pein toi=s metageneste/rois: kai\ ga\r ei) mhde/n
                    e)sti pro\s h(ma=s ta\ meta\ to\n qa/naton, kaqa/per e)/nioi tw=n filoso/fwn
                    qrulou=sin, o(/mws o(/ ge progegenhme/nos bi/os gi/netai polu\ xei/rwn to\n
                    a(/panta to\n ai)w=na e)pi\ kakw=| mnhmoneuo/menos. e)mfanh= de\ tou/twn
                    paradei/gmata lamba/nein e)/cesti toi=s a)nagnou=si ta\ kata\ me/ros th=sde th=s
                    bi/blou. para\ me\n ga\r *)aqhnai/ois tria/konta
                    tu/rannoi geno/menoi dia\ th\n i)di/an pleoneci/an th/n te patri/da mega/lois
                    a)tuxh/masi perie/balon kai\ au)toi\ taxu\ th\n du/namin a)pobalo/ntes
                    a)qa/naton e(autw=n o)/neidos kataleloi/pasi, *lakedaimo/nioi de\
                    peripoihsa/menoi th\n th=s *(ella/dos a)rxh\n a)namfisbh/thton, to/te tau/ths
                    e)sterh/qhsan, o(/te pra/ceis a)di/kous kata\ tw=n summa/xwn e)pitelei=n
                    e)pexei/rhsan: ai( ga\r tw=n h(gemo/nwn u(peroxai\ throu=ntai me\n eu)noi/a|
                    kai\ dikaiosu/nh|, katalu/ontai de\ a)dikh/masi kai\ mi/sei tw=n
                    u(potetagme/nwn. paraplhsi/ws de\ kai\
                    *dionu/sios o( *surakosi/wn tu/rannos, kai/per eu)tuxe/statos tw=n dunastw=n
                    gegonw/s, zw=n me\n ou) die/lipen e)pibouleuo/menos, kai\ dia\ to\n fo/bon
                    h)nagka/zeto fe/rein u(po\ to\n xitw=na sidhrou=n qw/raka, teleuth/sas de\
                    me/giston ei)s blasfhmi/as para/deigma katale/loipe to\n e(autou= bi/on ei)s
                    a(/panta to\n ai)w=na. a)lla\ peri\ me\n
                    tou/twn e)n toi=s oi)kei/ois xro/nois e(/kaston a)nagra/yomen safe/steron, nu=n
                    d' e)pi\ ta\ sunexh= toi=s proi+storhme/nois treyo/meqa, tou\s xro/nous mo/non
                    diori/zontes. e)n me\n ga\r tai=s pro\ tau/ths
                    bi/blois a)negra/yamen ta\s a)po\ *troi/as a(lw/sews pra/ceis e(/ws e)pi\ th\n
                    kata/lusin tou= te *peloponnhsiakou= pole/mou kai\ th=s *)aqhnai/wn h(gemoni/as,
                    dielqo/ntes e)/th e(ptako/sia e(bdomh/konta e)nne/a: e)n tau/th| de\ ta\s
                    sunexei=s pra/ceis prosanaplhrou=ntes a)rco/meqa e)k tw=n katastaqe/ntwn
                    *)aqh/nhsi tria/konta tura/nnwn, katalh/comen de\ e)pi\ th\n *(rw/mhs a(/lwsin
                    u(po\ *galatw=n, perilabo/ntes e)/th de/ka o)ktw/. a)narxi/as ga\r ou)/shs *)aqh/nhsi dia\ th\n kata/lusin th=s
                    h(gemoni/as, e)/tos me\n h)=n o)gdohkosto\n pro\s toi=s e(ptakosi/ois meta\ th\n

                    prosbola\s poiou/menoi kaq' h(me/ran pro\s o)xurou\s to/pous, ou)qe\n me\n
                    a)cio/logon e)/blapton tou\s u(penanti/ous, e(autw=n de\ pollou\s a)pe/ballon:
                    o(/mws d' ou)k a)fi/stanto th=s filotimi/as, e)lpi/zontes, e)a\n mh\ bi/a|
                    krath/swsi, tw=| ge xro/nw| pa/ntws tw=n a)nagkai/wn e)klipo/ntwn kataponh/sein.
                        tw=n de\ *(rwmai/wn e)n toiau/tais
                    taraxai=s o)/ntwn, oi( paroikou=ntes *turrhnoi\ meta\ duna/mews a(dra=s
                    e)peporeu/onto th\n tw=n *(rwmai/wn xw/ran lehlatou=ntes, kai\ pollw=n me\n
                    swma/twn, ou)k o)li/ghs d' w)felei/as e)gkratei=s e)ge/nonto. oi( d' ei)s tou\s
                    *bhi/ous tw=n *(rwmai/wn pefeugo/tes a)prosdokh/tws toi=s *turrhnoi=s
                    e)pipeso/ntes e)tre/yanto, kai\ th/n te lei/an a)fei/lanto kai\ th=s parembolh=s
                    e)kuri/eusan. e)gkratei=s de\ geno/menoi
                    pollw=n o(/plwn toi=s te a)no/plois ou)=si die/dwkan kai\ tou\s a)po\ th=s
                    xw/ras a)qroi/zontes kaqw/plizon: e)bou/lonto ga\r tou\s ei)s to\ *kapetw/lion
                    sumpefeugo/tas e)k th=s poliorki/as e)cele/sqai. a)porou/ntwn d' au)tw=n, w(=| tro/pw| dhlw/seian toi=s sugkekleime/nois dia\
                    to\ tou\s *keltou\s mega/lais duna/mesi peristratopedeu/ein, *komi/nio/s tis
                    *po/ntios u(pe/sxeto paraqarru/nein tou\s e)n tw=| *kapetwli/w|. o(rmh/sas ou)=n mo/nos kai\ dianhca/menos nukto\s to\n
                    potamo/n, e)/laqe proselqw/n tina pe/tran tou= *kapetwli/ou du/sbaton, kai\
                    tau/th| mo/gis e(auto\n e(lku/sas e)dh/lwse toi=s e)n tw=| *kapetwli/w| peri\
                    tw=n sunhqroisme/nwn ei)s *bhi/ous kai\ dio/ti kairo\n thrh/santes e)piqh/sontai
                    toi=s *keltoi=s. ou(=tos me\n ou)=n kataba\s h(=|per a)ne/bh kai\ diakolumbh/sas
                    to\n *ti/berin, ei)s *bhi/ous a)ne/streyen: oi(
                    de\ *keltoi\ katanoh/santes ta\ i)/xnh tou= prosfa/tws a)nabebhko/tos,
                    suneta/canto kata\ th=s au)th=s pe/tras a)nabh=nai nukto/s. dio\ kai\ peri\
                    me/sas nu/ktas oi( me\n fu/lakes parerra|qumhko/tes h)=san th=s fulakh=s dia\
                    th\n o)xuro/thta tou= to/pou, tw=n de\ *keltw=n tines kata\ th=s pe/tras
                    prosane/bhsan. tou\s me\n ou)=n fu/lakas
                    e)/laqon, xh=nes d' i(eroi\ th=s *(/hras trefo/menoi, kai\ qewrh/santes
                    a)nabai/nontas kraugh\n e)poi/oun. sundramo/ntwn de\ tw=n fula/kwn e)pi\ to\n
                    to/pon, ou(=toi me\n kataplage/ntes ou)k e)to/lmwn proselqei=n, *ma/rkos de/ tis
                    *ma/llios, e)/ndocos a)nh/r, e)kbohqh/sas e)pi\ to\n to/pon tw=| me\n ci/fei
                    th\n xei=ra tou= prosanabai/nontos a)pe/koye, tw=| de\ qurew=| pata/cas ei)s to\
                    sth=qos a)peku/lisen au)to\n a)po\ th=s pe/tras. paraplhsi/ws de\ kai\ tou= deute/rou prosanabai/nontos a)polome/nou, oi(
                    loipoi\ taxe/ws pa/ntes e)/fugon: a)porrw=gos de\ th=s pe/tras ou)/shs a(/pantes
                    katakrhmnisqe/ntes e)teleu/thsan. dio/per presbeuome/nwn tw=n *(rwmai/wn peri\
                    dialu/sews, e)pei/sqhsan xili/as labo/ntes li/tras xrusi/ou th\n po/lin
                    e)klipei=n kai\ e)k th=s *(rwmai/wn xw/ras a)pallagh=nai. *(rwmai=oi de/, tw=n me\n oi)kiw=n kateskamme/nwn, tw=n de\
                    plei/stwn politw=n a)polwlo/twn, e)/dwkan e)cousi/an tw=| boulome/nw| kaq' o(\n
                    proh/|rhtai to/pon oi)ki/an oi)kodomei=n, kai\ dhmosi/as kerami=das e)xorh/goun,
                    ai(\ me/xri tou= nu=n politikai\ kalou=ntai. a(pa/ntwn ou)=n pro\s th\n i)di/an proai/resin oi)kodomou/ntwn, sune/bh ta\s
                    kata\ po/lin o(dou\s stena\s gene/sqai kai\ kampa\s e)xou/sas: dio/per u(/steron
                    au)chqe/ntes ou)k h)dunh/qhsan eu)qei/as poih=sai ta\s o(dou/s. le/gousi de/
                    tines kai\ dio/ti to\n xrusou=n ko/smon ai( gunai=kes ei)s th\n koinh\n
                    swthri/an ei)sene/gkasai tau/ths e)/tuxon para\ tou= dh/mou timh=s, w(/st'
                    e)cousi/an e)/xein e)f' a(rma/twn o)xei=sqai kata\ th\n po/lin. tapeinw=n d' o)/ntwn tw=n *(rwmai/wn dia\ th\n proeirhme/nhn
                    sumfora/n, oi( *ou)o/lskoi pro\s au)tou\s po/lemon e)ch/negkan. oi( me\n ou)=n
                    xili/arxoi tw=n *(rwmai/wn katagra/yantes stratiw/tas, kai\ proagago/ntes th\n
                    du/namin ei)s u(/paiqron, e)n tw=| kaloume/nw| *marki/w| katestratope/deusan,
                    a)pe/xontes a)po\ *(rw/mhs stadi/ous diakosi/ous. tw=n de\ *ou)o/lskwn meta\ mei/zonos stratia=s
                    a)ntikaqhme/nwn kai\ th=| parembolh=| prosballo/ntwn, oi( kata\ th\n *(rw/mhn
                    fobhqe/ntes u(pe\r tw=n e)n tw=| stratope/dw|, kate/sthsan au)tokra/tora me\n
                    *ma/rkon *fou/rion   ou(=toi de\ pa/ntas
                    tou\s e)n h(liki/a| kaqopli/santes nukto\s e)ch=lqon, kai\ katalabo/ntes a(/m'
                    h(me/ra| tou\s *ou)o/lskous th=| parembolh=| prosmaxome/nous, e)pifane/ntes
                    kata\ nw/tou r(a|di/ws e)tre/yanto. e)celqo/ntwn de\ kai\ tw=n e)k th=s
                    parembolh=s, ei)s me/son a)polhfqe/ntes oi( *ou)o/lskoi sxedo\n a(/pantes
                    kateko/phsan. dio/per to\n e)/mprosqen xro/non i)sxuroi\ dokou=ntes ei)=nai,
                    dia\ th\n sumfora\n tau/thn a)sqene/statoi tw=n perioikou/ntwn e)qnw=n
                    e)genh/qhsan. meta\ de\ th\n ma/xhn a)kou/sas
                    o( au)tokra/twr porqei=sqai *bw/las u(po\ *ai)koulanw=n, tw=n nu=n *ai)ki/klwn
                    kaloume/nwn, a)gagw\n th\n du/namin tou\s plei/stous tw=n poliorkou/ntwn
                    a)nei=len. e)kei=qen d' a)ne/zeucen ei)s *soutrianh/n, ou)=san a)poiki/an, h(\n
                    oi( *turrhnoi\ bi/a| kateilh/feisan. prospesw\n ou)=n a)/fnw toi=s *turrhnoi=s
                    pollou\s me\n au)tw=n a)nei=le, th\n de\ po/lin a)ne/swse toi=s *soutriai/ois.
                        tw=n d' a)pelhluqo/twn *galatw=n a)po\
                    *(rw/mhs *ou)ea/skion th\n po/lin su/mmaxon ou)=san *(rwmai/wn porqou/ntwn,
                    e)piqe/menos au)toi=s o( au)tokra/twr kai\ tou\s plei/stous a)poktei/nas th=s
                    a)poskeuh=s pa/shs e)kuri/eusen, e)n h(=| kai\ to\ xrusi/on h)=n o(\
                    ei)lh/feisan ei)s *(rw/mhn kai\ sxedo\n a(/panta ta\ dihrpasme/na kata\ th\n
                    th=s po/lews a(/lwsin. tosau=ta de\
                    diapraca/menos dia\ to\n fqo/non tw=n dhma/rxwn e)kwlu/qh qri/ambon katagagei=n.
                    e)/nioi de/ fasin au)to\n a)po\ *tou/skwn qri/ambon a)gagei=n e)pi\ leukou=
                    teqri/ppou, kai\ dia\ tou=to dusi\n u(/steron e)/tesin u(po\ tou= dh/mou
                    polloi=s xrh/masi katadikasqh=nai: peri\ ou(= kata\ tou\s oi)kei/ous xro/nous
                    e)pimnhsqhso/meqa. oi( d' ei)s th\n *)iapugi/an
                    tw=n *keltw=n e)lhluqo/tes a)ne/streyan dia\ th=s tw=n *(rwmai/wn xw/ras: kai\
                    met' o)li/gon u(po\ *keri/wn e)pibouleuqe/ntes nukto\s a(/pantes kateko/phsan
                    e)n tw=| *trausi/w| pedi/w|. *kallisqe/nhs d' o( i(storiogra/fos a)po\ th=s kata\ tou=ton
                    to\n e)niauto\n genome/nhs ei)rh/nhs toi=s *(/ellhsi pro\s *)artace/rchn to\n
                    tw=n *persw=n basile/a th\n i(stori/an h)=rktai gra/fein: dielqw\n de\
                    triakontaeth= xro/non e)/graye me\n bu/blous de/ka, th\n de\ teleutai/an
                    kate/pause th=s sunta/cews ei)s th\n u(po\ tou= *filomh/lou tou= *fwke/ws
                    kata/lhyin tou= e)n *delfoi=s i(erou=. h(mei=s
                    d' e)pei\ pa/resmen e)pi\ th\n genome/nhn toi=s *(/ellhsin ei)rh/nhn pro\s
                    *)artace/rchn kai\ to\n th=s *(rw/mhs u(po\ *galatw=n ki/ndunon, kata\ th\n e)n
                    a)rxh=| pro/qesin tou=to te/los poihso/meqa th=sde th=s bu/blou.

l.#text: ei(=s oi)wno\s a)/ristos a)mu/nesqai peri\ pa/trhs.

p.#text:
par' o(/lhn th\n pragmatei/an ei)wqo/tes xrh=sqai th=|
                    sunh/qei th=s i(stori/as parrhsi/a|, kai\ toi=s me\n a)gaqoi=s a)ndra/sin e)pi\
                    tw=n kalw=n e)/rgwn to\n di/kaion e)pile/gein e)/painon, tou\s de\ fau/lous,
                    o(/tan e)camarta/nwsin, a)ciou=n dikai/as e)pitimh/sews, dia\ tou= toiou/tou
                    tro/pou nomi/zomen tou\s me\n eu)= pefuko/tas pro\s a)reth\n tw=| dia\ th=s
                    do/chs a)qanatismw=| protre/yesqai tai=s kalli/stais e)gxeirei=n pra/cesi, tou\s
                    de\ th\n e)nanti/an e)/xontas dia/qesin tai=s a(rmottou/sais blasfhmi/ais
                    a)potre/yein th=s e)pi\ th\n kaki/an o(rmh=s. dio\ kai\ th=| grafh=| paro/ntes e)p' e)kei/nous tou\s xro/nous, e)n oi(=s
                    *lakedaimo/nioi peri\ *leu=ktra parado/cws h(tthqe/ntes mega/lh| perie/peson
                    sumfora=|, kai\ pa/lin peri\ *manti/neian ptai/santes a)nelpi/stws a)pe/balon
                    th\n tw=n *(ellh/nwn h(gemoni/an, h(gou/meqa dei=n th\n u(po/stasin th=s grafh=s
                    diafula/ttein kai\ th\n a(rmo/ttousan e)piti/mhsin toi=s *lakedaimoni/ois
                    poih/sasqai. ti/s ga\r a)\n ou)x h(gh/saito
                    kathgori/as au)tou\s a)ci/ous u(pa/rxein, oi(/tines para\ tw=n progo/nwn
                    paralabo/ntes h(gemoni/an ka/llista teqemeliwme/nhn, kai\ tau/thn dia\ th\n
                    a)reth\n tw=n progo/nwn diafulaxqei=san e)/th plei/w tw=n pentakosi/wn, oi(
                    to/te *lakedaimo/nioi dia\ th\n e(autw=n a)bouli/an kataluqei=san e)pei=don,
                    ou)k a)lo/gws. oi( me\n ga\r pro\ au)tw=n bebiwko/tes polloi=s po/nois kai\
                    mega/lois kindu/nois th\n thlikau/thn katekth/santo do/can, e)pieikw=s kai\
                    filanqrw/pws prosfero/menoi toi=s u(potetagme/nois: oi( de\ metagene/steroi
                    biai/ws kai\ xalepw=s xrw/menoi toi=s summa/xois, e)/ti de\ pole/mous a)di/kous
                    kai\ u(perhfa/nous e)nista/menoi pro\s tou\s *(/ellhnas, ou)k a)lo/gws
                    a)pe/balon th\n a)rxh\n dia\ ta\s i)di/as a)bouli/as. e)n ga\r tai=s sumforai=s au)tw=n to\ mi=sos tw=n
                    a)dikoume/nwn e)/labe kairo\n a)mu/nasqai tou\s prohdikhko/tas, kai\ toi=s e)k
                    progo/nwn a)nikh/tois gegono/si tosau/th katafro/nhsis e)phkolou/qhsen, o(/shn
                    ei)ko/s e)sti gene/sqai kata\ tw=n a)nairou/ntwn ta\s tw=n progo/nwn a)reta/s.
                        toigarou=n *qhbai=oi me\n oi( pro/teron
                    e)pi\ polla\s genea\s toi=s krei/ttosin u(potetagme/noi, to/te tou/tous
                    a)nelpi/stws nikh/santes h(gemo/nes kate/sthsan tw=n *(ellh/nwn, *lakedaimo/nioi
                    de\ meta\ th\n a)fai/resin th=s h(gemoni/as ou)de/pot' e)dunh/qhsan a)nalabei=n
                    to\ tw=n progo/nwn a)ci/wma. h(mei=s de\
                    tou/tois a)rkou/ntws e)pitetimhko/tes e)pi\ to\ sunexe\s th=s i(stori/as
                    metabhso/meqa prodiori/santes tou\s oi)kei/ous th=| grafh=| xro/nous. h( me\n
                    ou)=n pro\ tau/ths bu/blos, ou)=sa th=s o(/lhs sunta/cews tessareskaideka/th,
                    to\ te/los e)/sxe tw=n pra/cewn ei)s to\n *(rhgi/nwn a)ndrapodismo\n u(po\
                    *dionusi/ou kai\ th\n a(/lwsin th=s *(rw/mhs u(po\ *galatw=n, h(/tis e)ge/neto
                    kata\ to\n prohgou/menon e)niauto\n th=s *persw=n stratei/as ei)s *ku/pron e)p'
                    *eu)ago/ran to\n basile/a: e)n tau/th| de\ th\n a)rxh\n a)po\ tou/tou tou=
                    pole/mou poihsa/menoi katalh/comen e)pi\ to\n prohgou/menon e)niauto\n th=s
                    *fili/ppou tou= *)amu/ntou basilei/as. e)p'
                    a)/rxontos ga\r *)aqh/nhsi *mustixi/dou *(rwmai=oi me\n a)nti\ tw=n u(pa/twn
                    xilia/rxous trei=s kate/sthsan, *ma/rkon *fou/rion, e)/ti de\ *ga/ion kai\
                    *ai)mi/lion. e)pi\ de\ tou/twn *)artace/rchs o( tw=n *persw=n basileu\s
                    e)stra/teusen e)p' *eu)ago/ran to\n *ku/prou basile/a. polu\n de\ xro/non
                    a)sxolhqei\s peri\ ta\s ei)s to\n po/lemon paraskeua\s sunesth/sato du/namin
                    nautikh/n te kai\ pezh\n mega/lhn: to\ me\n ga\r pezo\n stra/teuma muria/dwn
                    h)=n tria/konta su\n i(ppeu=si, trih/reis de\ kateskeu/ase plei/ous tw=n
                    triakosi/wn. strathgou\s d' a)pe/deice th=s
                    pezh=s duna/mews *)oro/ntan khdesth/n, th=s de\ nautikh=s *tiri/bazon, a)/ndra
                    mega/lhs a)podoxh=s tugxa/nonta para\ toi=s *pe/rsais. ou(=toi de\ paralabo/ntes
                    ta\s duna/meis e)n *fwkai/a| kai\ *ku/mh| kath/nthsan ei)s *kiliki/an, kai\
                    peraiwqe/ntes ei)s *ku/pron e)nergw=s diw/|koun to\n po/lemon. o( d' *eu)ago/raspro\s me\n to\n *)/akorin to\n *ai)gupti/wn
                    basile/a, pole/mion o)/nta *persw=n, summaxi/an e)poih/sato kai\ du/namin
                    a)cio/logon par' au)tou= prosela/beto, par' *(ekato/mnou de\ tou= *kari/as
                    duna/stou, la/qra| sumpra/ttontos au)tw=|, xrhma/twn e)/labe plh=qos ei)s
                    diatrofh\n cenikw=n duna/mewn: o(moi/ws de\ kai\ tou\s a)/llous tou\s
                    a)llotri/ws e)/xontas pro\s *pe/rsas, tou\s me\n laqrai/ws, tou\s de\ kai\
                    fanerw=s e)pespa/sato koinwnh/sontas tou= *persikou= pole/mou. e)kuri/eue de\ kata\ me\n th\n *ku/pron tw=n po/lewn sxedo/n
                    ti pasw=n, kata\ de\ th\n *foini/khn *tu/rou kai/ tinwn e(te/rwn. ei)=xe de\
                    trih/reis me\n e)nenh/konta, kai\ tou/twn u(ph=rxon *tu/riai me\n ei)/kosi,
                    *ku/priai d' e(bdomh/konta, stratiw/tas d' i)di/ous me\n e(cakisxili/ous, para\
                    de\ tw=n summa/xwn pollw=| tou/twn plei/ous. pro\s de\ tou/tois misqofo/rous
                    pollou\s e)cenolo/gei, e)/xwn xrhma/twn dayi/leian. e)/pemye d' au)tw=| kai\ o(
                    tw=n *)ara/bwn basileu\s stratiw/tas ou)k o)li/gous kai\ a)/lloi tine\s oi( e)n
                    u(poyi/ais o)/ntes tw=| tw=n *persw=n basilei=. ou(=tos
                    me\n ou)=n tosau/tas a)forma\s e)/xwn teqarrhko/tws sugkate/bainen ei)s to\n
                    po/lemon. kai\ prw=ton me\n lh|strika\s e)/xwn nau=s ou)k o)li/gas e)fh/dreuse
                    tai=s komizome/nais tw=n polemi/wn a)gorai=s, kai\ ta\s me\n au)tw=n die/fqeiren
                    e)n qala/tth|, ta\s de\ diekw/lusen, e)ni/as de\ a)fei/lato. dio\ kai\ tw=n
                    e)mpo/rwn mh\ tolmw/ntwn ei)s th\n *ku/pron parakomi/zein si=ton, mega/lwn de\

                    pezou\s misqofo/rous e)/xwn au(tw=| sustrateu/ontas: o( de\ khdesth\s tou= *data/mou tw=n i(ppe/wn a)fhgou/menos,
                    xa/rin boulo/menos kataqe/sqai kai\ th=s i)di/as swthri/as a(/ma pronoou/menos,
                    a)posta\s nukto\s meta\ tw=n i(ppe/wn a)ph/laune pro\s tou\s polemi/ous,
                    sunteqeime/nos pro\s *)arta/bazon th=| pro/teron h(me/ra| peri\ th=s prodosi/as.
                        *data/mhs de\ parakale/sas tou\s

                    tou\s ei)s xei=ras e)rxome/nous. o( d'
                    *)arta/bazos, to\ me\n prw=ton to\ a)lhqe\s a)gnow=n, u(polabw\n de\ to\n
                    a)posta/thn tou= *data/mou palimprodosi/an poiei=sqai, parh/ggeile toi=s

                    me/sois a)polhfqei/s, kai\ tw=n me\n w(s prodo/thn a)munome/nwn, tw=n de\ w(s
                    palimprodo/thn timwroume/nwn, e)n a)pori/a| kaqeisth/kei: th=s d' a)pori/as ou)k

                    to\n *data/mhn a)poxwrh/santes h)ci/oun tuxei=n suggnw/mhs, oi( de\ loipoi\ th\n

                    qaumazo/menos, pollw=| to/te ma=llon e)/sxe peribo/hton th/n te a)ndrei/an kai\
                    th\n e)n tw=| strathgei=n su/nesin: o( de\ basileu\s *)artace/rchs puqo/menos

                    e)piboulh=s au)to\n e)dolofo/nhsen. a(/ma de\ tou/tois
                    prattome/nois *(reomi/qrhs, u(po\ tw=n a)postatw=n pemfqei\s ei)s *ai)/gupton

                    nau=s de\ makra\s penth/konta, kate/pleuse th=s *)asi/as ei)s ta\s
                    o)nomazome/nas *leu/kas. ei)s de\ tau/thn th\n po/lin metapemya/menos pollou\s

                    h(gemw\n tw=n e)c *ai)gu/ptou stratiwtw=n, kai\ pemfqei\s a)po\ th=s *foini/khs
                    poliorkei=n ta\s e)n th=| *suri/a| po/leis, sugka/tainos geno/menos tai=s tou=

                    a)nabh=nai pro\s to\n basile/a, kai\ suggnw/mhn h)ci/ou dou=nai peri\ tw=n

                    pareka/lei qarrei=n: th=s ga\r ni/khs tugxa/nein ou) tou\s kata\ to\ plh=qos

                    ei)/s tina po/lin eu)mege/qh. oi( d'
                    *ai)gu/ptioi to\ prw=ton e)polio/rkoun tou\s sugkekleisme/nous: e)pei\ de\

                    tw=n e)pithdei/wn e)canalwqe/ntwn, o( me\n *taxw\s a)pe/gnw th\n swthri/an, o(
                    de\ *)aghsi/laos parakale/sas tou\s stratiw/tas, kai\ nukto\s e)piqe/menos toi=s

                    toi=s o(/rkois h)=n gegramme/non e(ka/stous ei)s th\n e(autw=n a)pie/nai
                    patri/da meta\ th\n ma/xhn, ei)s de\ th\n *mega/lhn po/lin u(ph=rxon ai(
                    perioikou=sai po/leis metw|kisme/nai kai\ dusxerw=s fe/rousai th\n e)k th=s

                    oi( me\n e)k tw=n polisma/twn h)ci/oun au)toi=s bohqei=n *mantinei=s kai\ tw=n
                    a)/llwn *)arka/dwn tina/s, e)/ti de\ *)hlei/ous kai\ tou\s a)/llous tou\s

                    a)gapw/menon e(/teron *pausani/an o(mw/numon e(autw=| o)neidistikoi=s pro\s
                    au)to\n e)xrh/sato lo/gois, fh/sas a)ndro/gunon ei)=nai kai\ tou\s tw=n
                    boulome/nwn e)/rwtas e(toi/mws prosde/xesqai. o( de\ th\n e)k th=s loidori/as u(/brin ou)k e)ne/gkas to\ me\n paro\n
                    katesiw/phsen, *)atta/lw| de/ tini tw=n fi/lwn e)pikoinwsa/menos peri\ tw=n
                    mello/ntwn pra/ttesqai e(kousi/ws kai\ parado/cws e(auto\n e)k tou= zh=n
                    mete/sthsen. met' o)li/gas ga\r h(me/ras tou=
                    *fili/ppou pro\s *pleuri/an to\n tw=n *)illuriw=n basile/a diagwnizome/nou pro\
                    tou= basile/ws sta\s a(pa/sas ta\s ferome/nas e)p' au)to\n plhga\s a)nede/cato
                    tw=| i)di/w| sw/mati kai\ meth/llacen. diabohqei/shs de\ th=s pra/cews o( me\n *)/attalos, ei(=s w)\n tw=n e)c
                    au)lh=s kai\ polu\ duname/nwn para\ tw=| basilei=, e)ka/lesen e)pi\ dei=pnon
                    to\n *pausani/an kai\ polu\n e)mforh/sas a)/kraton pare/dwken au)tou= to\ sw=ma
                    toi=s o)rewko/mois ei)s u(/brin kai\ paroini/an e(tairikh/n. o( de\ a)nanh/yas e)k th=s me/qhs kai\ th=| tou= sw/matos
                    u(/brei perialgh\s geno/menos tou= *)atta/lou kathgo/rhsen e)pi\ tou= basile/ws.
                    o( de\ *fi/lippos parwcu/nqh me\n e)pi\ th=| paranomi/a| th=s pra/cews, dia\ de\
                    th\n pro\s *)/attalon oi)keio/thta kai\ th\n ei)s to\ paro\n au)tou= xrei/an
                    ou)k e)bou/leto misoponhrei=n: h)=n ga\r o(
                    *)/attalos th=s me\n e)pigamhqei/shs gunaiko\s u(po\ tou= basile/ws *kleopa/tras
                    a)delfidou=s, e)pi\ de\ th=s proapestalme/nhs duna/mews ei)s th\n *)asi/an
                    strathgo\s prokexeirisme/nos, e)n de\ toi=s polemikoi=s a)gw=sin a)ndrei=os.
                    dio/per o( basileu\s prau=+nai boulo/menos tou= *pausani/ou th\n e)pi\ tw=|
                    pa/qei gegenhme/nhn dikai/an o)rgh\n dwrea\s a)ciolo/gous a)pe/neimen au)tw=|
                    kai\ kata\ th\n swmatofulaki/an proh=gen au)to\n e)nti/mws. o( de\ *pausani/as
                    a)meta/qeton fula/ttwn th\n o)rgh\n e)/speude mh\ mo/non para\ tou= pra/cantos
                    labei=n timwri/an, a)lla\ kai\ para\ tou= mh\ timwrou=ntos au)tw=|.
                    sunepela/beto de\ tau/ths th=s proaire/sews ma/lista o( sofisth\s *(ermokra/ths.
                    tou= ga\r *pausani/ou sxola/zontos au)tw=| kai\ kata\ th\n diatribh\n puqome/nou
                    pw=s a)/n tis ge/noito e)pifane/statos, o( sofisth\s a)pekri/qh ei) to\n ta\
                    me/gista pra/canta a)ne/loi: th=| ga\r peri\ tou/tou mnh/mh| sumperilhfqh/sesqai
                    kai\ to\n th\n a)nai/resin au)tou= poihsa/menon. a)nene/gkas de\ pro\s th\n i)di/an o)rgh\n to\n lo/gon kai\ dia\ to\n qumo\n
                    ou)demi/an th=s gnw/mhs u(pe/rqesin poihsa/menos e)n au)toi=s toi=s
                    u(pokeime/nois a)gw=si th\n e)piboulh\n sunesth/sato toiw=|de/ tini tro/pw|.
                        i(/ppous parasthsa/menos tai=s pu/lais
                    parh=lqe pro\s ta\s ei)s to\ qe/atron ei)so/dous e)/xwn kekrumme/nhn *keltikh\n
                    ma/xairan. tou= de\ *fili/ppou tou\s parakolouqou=ntas fi/lous keleu/santos
                    proeiselqei=n ei)s to\ qe/atron kai\ tw=n dorufo/rwn diestw/twn, o(rw=n to\n
                    basile/a memonwme/non prose/drame kai\ dia\ tw=n pleurw=n diantai/an e)ne/gkas
                    plhgh\n to\n me\n basile/a nekro\n e)ce/teinen, au)to\s d' e)pi\ ta\s pu/las
                    kai\ tou\s h(toimasme/nous pro\s th\n fugh\n e)/qeen i(/ppous. eu)qu\s de\ tw=n swmatofula/kwn oi( me\n pro\s to\ sw=ma
                    tou= basile/ws w(/rmhsan, oi( d' e)pi\ to\n tou= sfage/ws diwgmo\n e)cexu/qhsan,
                    e)n oi(=s u(ph=rxon kai\ *leo/nnatos kai\ *perdi/kkas kai\ *)/attalos. o( de\
                    *pausani/as prolabw\n th=s diw/cews e)/fqasen a)\n e)pi\ to\n i(/ppon
                    a)naphdh/sas, ei) mh\ th=s u(pode/sews peri\ a)/mpelo/n tina periplakei/shs
                    e)/pesen. dio/per oi( peri\ to\n *perdi/kkan katalabo/ntes au)to\n e)k th=s gh=s
                    a)nista/menon kai\ sugkenth/santes a)nei=lon. *fi/lippos
                    me\n ou)=n me/gistos geno/menos tw=n kaq' e(auto\n e)pi\ th=s *eu)rw/phs
                    basile/wn kai\ dia\ to\ me/geqos th=s a)rxh=s e(auto\n toi=s dw/deka qeoi=s
                    su/nqronon katariqmh/sas toiau/ths e)/tuxe th=s tou= bi/ou katastrofh=s, a)/rcas
                    e)/th te/ssara pro\s toi=s ei)/kosi. dokei= d'
                    ou(=tos o( basileu\s e)laxi/stas me\n ei)s th\n monarxi/an a)forma\s
                    pareilhfe/nai, megi/sthn de\ tw=n par' *(/ellhsi monarxiw=n katakth/sasqai,
                    hu)chke/nai de\ th\n h(gemoni/an ou)x ou(/tw dia\ th=s e)n toi=s o(/plois
                    a)ndragaqi/as w(s dia\ th=s e)n toi=s lo/gois o(mili/as kai\ filofrosu/nhs.
                        fasi\ de\ kai\ au)to\n to\n *fi/lippon
                    semnu/nesqai ma=llon e)pi\ th=| strathgikh=| sune/sei kai\ toi=s dia\ th=s
                    o(mili/as e)piteu/gmasin h)/per e)pi\ th=| kata\ ta\s ma/xas a)ndrei/a|:
                        tw=n me\n ga\r kata\ tou\s a)gw=nas
                    katorqwma/twn mete/xein a(/pantas tou\s strateuome/nous, tw=n de\ dia\ th=s
                    o(mili/as ginome/nwn e)piteugma/twn au)to\n mo/non lamba/nein th\n e)pigrafh/n.
                        h(mei=s d' e)peidh\ pa/resmen e)pi\ th\n
                    *fili/ppou teleuth/n, tau/thn me\n th\n bi/blon au)tou= perigra/yomen kata\ th\n
                    e)n a)rxh=| pro/qesin, th=s d' e)xome/nhs a)rxh\n th\n *)aleca/ndrou para/lhyin
                    th=s basilei/as poihsa/menoi peiraso/meqa perilabei=n a(pa/sas au)tou= ta\s
                    pra/ceis e)n mia=| bi/blw|.

                    xale/paine mhde\ a)pei/lei: ei) de\ mh/, metri/ws h(mi=n melh/sei: oi)=das ga\r

p.#text:
h( me\n pro\ tau/ths bu/blos, ou)=sa th=s o(/lhs
                    sunta/cews e(ckaideka/th, th\n a)rxh\n e)/sxen a)po\ th=s *fili/ppou tou=
                    *)amu/ntou basilei/as: perielh/fqhsan d' e)n au)th=| pra/ceis ai( me\n tou=
                    *fili/ppou pa=sai me/xri th=s teleuth=s, ai( de\ tw=n a)/llwn basile/wn te kai\
                    e)qnw=n kai\ po/lewn o(/sai gego/nasi kata\ tou\s th=s basilei/as tau/ths
                    xro/nous, o)/ntas e)tw=n ei)/kosi kai\ tessa/rwn. e)n tau/th| de\ ta\s sunexei=s pra/ceis a)nagra/fontes
                    a)rco/meqa me\n a)po\ th=s *)aleca/ndrou basilei/as, perilabo/ntes de\ ta\
                    tou/tw| tw=| basilei= praxqe/nta me/xri th=s teleuth=s sunanagra/yomen kai\ ta\
                    a(/ma tou/tois suntelesqe/nta e)n toi=s gnwrizome/nois me/resi th=s
                    oi)koume/nhs: ou(/tw ga\r ma/lista u(polamba/nomen ta\s pra/ceis
                    eu)mnhmoneu/tous e)/sesqai, kefalaiwdw=s teqei/sas kai\ sunexe\s e)xou/sas tai=s
                    a)rxai=s to\ te/los. e)n o)li/gw| de\ xro/nw|
                    mega/las pra/ceis ou(=tos o( basileu\s kateirga/sato kai\ dia\ th\n i)di/an
                    su/nesi/n te kai\ a)ndrei/an u(pereba/leto tw=| mege/qei tw=n e)/rgwn pa/ntas
                    tou\s e)c ai)w=nos th=| mnh/mh| paradedome/nous basilei=s: e)n e)/tesi ga\r dw/deka katastreya/menos th=s me\n
                    *eu)rw/phs ou)k o)li/ga, th\n de\ *)asi/ansxedo\n a(/pasan ei)ko/tws peribo/hton
                    e)/sxe th\n do/can kai\ toi=s palaioi=s h(/rwsi kai\ h(miqe/ois i)sa/zousan.
